result.heading: THE LORD OF THE RINGS EXT

direction.raw_text: amar prestar sen: han mathon ne nen, han mathon ne chae...a han noston ned wilith." (English:) The world is changed: I feel it in the water, I feel it in the earth, I smell it in the air...Much that once was is lost, for none now live who remember it. SUPER: THE LORD OF THE RINGS EXT. PROLOGUE -- DAY IMAGE: FLICKERING FIRELIGHT. The NOLDORIN FORGE in EREGION. MOLTEN GOLD POURS from the lip of an IRON LADLE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It began with the forging of the Great Rings. IMAGE: THREE RINGS, each set with a single GEM, are received by the HIGH ELVES-GALADRIEL, GIL-GALAD and CIRDAN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three were given to the Elves, immortal, wisest...fairest of all beings. IMAGE: SEVEN RINGS held aloft in triumph by the DWARF LORDS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Seven to the Dwarf Lords, great miners and craftsmen of the mountain halls. IMAGE: NINE RINGS clutched tightly by the KINGS OF MEN...as if holding-close a precious secret.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And Nine...nine rings were gifted to the race of Men who, above all else, desire power. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For within these rings was bound the strength and will to govern each race.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) But they were all of them deceived. FADE UP: An ancient PARCHMENT MAP of MIDDLE EARTH...moving slowly across the MAP as if drawn by an unseen force the CAMERA closes in on a PLACE NAME...MORDOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...for another ring was made. TEASING SHOTS: SAURON forging the ONE RING in the CHAMBERS of SAMMATH NAUR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the land of Mordor, in the fires of Mount Doom, the Dark Lord Sauron forged in secret a Master Ring to control all others. IMAGE: The ONE RING reflecting FIERY LAVA!   FIRE WRITING emerges on the plain BAND OF GOLD.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...and into this Ring he poured his cruelty, his malice and his will to dominate all life. IMAGE: THE ONE RING falls through SPACE and into flames...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One Ring to rule them all... IMAGE: A GREAT SHADOW falls across the MAP...closing in around the realm of GONDOR... IMAGE: SCREAMING VILLAGERS, MEN, WOMEN, AND CHILDREN, RUN from their homes, pursued by ARMIES OF HIDEOUS ORCS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One by one the Free lands of Middle earth fell to the power of the ring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) But there were some...who resisted. (CONTINUED) 3. CONTINUED: FADE UP: ISILDUR, son of the KING OF GONDOR, leads an ARMY ACROSS the PLAINS OF DAGORLAD...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A last alliance of Men and Elves marched against the armies of Mordor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On the slopes of Mount Doom they fought for the freedom of Middle- Earth. TEASING SHOTS: THE BATTLE OF DAGORLAD...THE ELF LORD, ELROND, commands rank after rank of ELVEN ARCHERS...ORCS RETREATING before the ARMY of the LAST ALLIANCE...ELENDIL holds aloft the great sword....NARSIL!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Victory was near! IMAGES: THE HUGE, DARK FIGURE OF SARURON, bearing the ONE RING on his finger, looms over the field of battle...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But the power of the Ring could not be undone. IMAGE: SAURON lays waste to the armies of the LAST ALLIANCE. With desperate courage, ELENDIL leads a charge...THE BLACK MACE OF SAURON LASHES OUT!! IMAGE: ELENDIL'S body falls like a crumpled rag doll... IMAGE: ISILDUR cradles the body of his father in his arms. The SHADOW OF SAURON falls over him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was in this moment..when all hope had faded, that Isildur, son of the king, took up his father's sword. ISILDUR snatches up the BROKEN BLADE OF NARSIL..The BLADE severs SAURON'S FINGERS... AND THE ONE RING FLIES from his body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sauron, the enemy of the Free Peoples of Middle Earth, was defeated. SAURON'S ARMOR clatters to the ground. His body GONE....VAPORIZED! CLOSE ON: ISILDUR picks up the SEVERED FINGER and removes the ONE RING...transfixed!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Ring passed to Isildur...who had this one chance to destroy evil forever. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: IMAGE: GLADDEN FIELD...ISILDUR leads a small column of men through DARKENING WOODS...the ONE RING glinting on a CHAIN around his neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But the hearts of Men are easily corrupted. And the Ring of Power has a will of its own. SUDDENLY!    ARROWS FLY!   They are ambushed by ORCS...ISILDUR SCREAMS!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : ISILDUR MATERIALIZES UNDER WATER...as THE RING slips slowly from his finger. Ripples of LIGHT play across ISILDUR'S PALE FACE...he is DEAD.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It betrayed Isildur to his death. IMAGE: THE RING falls through the MURKY WATERS of the RIVER ANDUIN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And some things that should not have been forgotten...were lost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (CONT'D) History became legend...legend became myth. FADE UP: The waters of the ANDUIN RIVER lie dark and undisturbed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And for two and a half thousand years the Ring passed out of all knowledge. IMAGE: SILT SWIRLS...A THIN WHITE HAND reaches down...grasping the RING...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Until, when chance came, it ensnared a new bearer! IMAGE: THE THIN WHITE HAND opens to reveal one ring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My Precious...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMAGE: MIST SHROUDED MOUNTAINS...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Ring came to the creature Gollum, who took it deep into the tunnels of the Misty Mountains. IMAGE: THE GLOOM of a MOUNTAIN CAVERN..a MURKY POOL of WATER...in the DARKNESS the SHADOWY OUTLINE of an EMACIATED FIGURE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And there, it consumed him. A RASPY VOICE mutters in the half light...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It came to me. My own.     My love... (ecstatic whisper) My preciousness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Ring brought to Gollum unnatural long life. For five hundred years it poisoned his mind. And in the gloom of Gollum's cave...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.)   (CONT'D) It waited. FADE UP: Bathed in COLD MOONLIGHT, the WORLD lies DARK and STILL...the unsettled quiet before the storm...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Darkness crept back into the forests of the world. Rumor grew of a Shadow in the East...whispers of a nameless fear. And the Ring of Power perceived...its time had now come. It abandoned Gollum. SLOW MOTION: unseen by its KEEPER..THE RING falls to the MUDDY FLOOR of a MOUNTAIN TUNNEL...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But something happened then the Ring did not intend...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : FUMBLING in the dark, a SMALL HAND closes over the 6. RING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was picked up by the most unlikely creature imaginable...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to himself) What's this? A YOUNGISH LOOKING BILBO BAGGINS peers down at what lies in his hand...PERPLEXED by what he has found.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A Hobbit....Bilbo Baggins of the Shire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (surprised) A Ring. SUDDENLY!   A VOICE SCREAMS...ITS ANGUISH RINGING through the COLD, DANK TUNNELS...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lost!   Lost! My Precious is lost!! Frightened Bilbo quickly POCKETS the ONE RING and hurries on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : WIDE ON: THE CAMERA SOARS AWAY FROM THE MOUNTAINS.      MOVING FASTER AND FASTER...THEIR DARK GREEN FORESTS AND JAGGED WHITE PEAKS RECEDING INTO THE SHROUD OF MIST GALADRIEL (V.O.) For the time will soon come when Hobbits will shape the fortunes of all. FADE TO BLACK FADE IN: EXT. HOBBITON WOODS -- DAY ANGLE ON: TWO HOBBIT FEET resting on a small rock...rising out of the LONG, OVERGROWN GRASSES SUPER: THE FELLOWSHIP OF THE RING SUPER: THE SHIRE....60 YEARS LATER CAMERA TRACKS TO: a Figure lies beneath the dappled sunlight of an old tree. (CONTINUED) 7. CONTINUED: White flowers are scattered among the Well seeded grasses. An idyllic setting at the end of a long hot summer... the figure is reading a book. ON THE SOUNDTRACK: In the distance, growing louder..over the Gentle clip clop of an approaching cart and horse can be heard the HUMMING OF A DEEP VOICE to the tune of "The Road Goes Ever On and On..." SUDDENLY! The figure in the grass sits up...looking straight at camera is a handsome young HOBBIT, with dark curly hair and deep blue eyes. This is FRODO BAGGINS...his EYES alight with EXCITEMENT! Tossing away the long stem of grass in his mouth, Frodo runs off. CUT TO: EXT. SHIRE LANE -- DAY The cart rattles along a leafy lane, driven by a stooped figure in Grey. INTERCUT WITH; SHOTS OF FRODO RUNNING... CAREERING DOWN A HILL. . .JUMPING OVER LOGS... DODGING TREE BRANCHES. ANGLE ON: The shambling OLD PONY snorts and rears as... SUDDENLY FRODO appears on a bank above the cart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're late. CLOSE ON: GANDALF glowers at the young Hobbit...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wizard is never late, Frodo Baggins, nor is he early. He arrives precisely when he means to. They look at each other a moment..then both start laughing as FRODO'S face breaks into a smile and he leaps on to the front seat of the cart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's wonderful to see you, Gandalf! Next to Gandalf, we see how small Hobbits are...Frodo is 3 foot 6 inches tall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You didn't think I'd miss your Uncle Bilbo's birthday?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 8. EXT. HOBBITON FIELDS -- DAY Wide on: The cart rattles past a FIELD LUPIN being tended by HOBBITS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What news of the outside world? Tell me everything!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON: Gandalf looks down at Frodo, a twinkle in his eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What, everything? Far too eager and curious for a Hobbit. Most unnatural... Wide on: The cart rattles over a Stone bridge towards a Busy Hobbit Marketplace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, what can I tell you? Life in the wide world goes on much as if it has past age. Full of its own comings and goings, scarcely even aware of the existence of Hobbits... Close on: Gandalf as he surveys the peaceful scene before him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...for which I am very thankful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON: Hobbits look up exclaiming in wonder and excitement as the cart bearing Gandalf and Frodo rolls past the Green Dragon Inn...towards... Wide on: The party field. Where scOrcs of Hobbits are busy preparing for the big night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, the long expected party. So, how is the old rascal? I hear it's going to be a Party of Special Magnificence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know Bilbo...he's got he whole place in an uproar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, well...that should please him. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Half the Shire's been invited...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good gracious, me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's up to something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, really? Frodo shoots a knowing look, as Gandalf averts his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright then..keep your secrets. Before you came along we Bagginses were very well thought of.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Indeed?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never had any adventures or did anything unexpected.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you're referring to the incident with the Dragon...I was barely involved...all I did was give your Uncle a little nudge out the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever you did...you've been officially labelled as a Disturber of the Peace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, really?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON: ODO PROUDFOOT looks up as the Cart passes by, deeply suspicious. CUT TO: EXT. HOBBITON -- DAY CRANE UP: As the cart rattles into the small village of Hobbiton...a quaint rustic settlement, nestled amongst rolling green hills and large trees. (CONTINUED) 10. CONTINUED: The Hobbits live in Hobbit Holes: neat burrows dug into the grassy hillside, with round doors and cute front gardens. ANGLE ON: Excited children, chasing after the cart. CLOSE ON: Gandalf ignOrcs the children's cries. The children stand deflated, watching Gandalf disappear up the lane. At that moment: spinning balls of bright color suddenly leap out of the cart, fizzing over the heads of the delighted children. ANGLE ON: Gandalf smiling to himself, well pleased with his joke. ODO PROUDFOOT is unable to suppress a chuckle. Frodo stands up in the cart as Gandalf reigns in the horse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gandalf... I'm glad you're back. Frodo leaps expertly from the cart. Gandalf smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So am I, dear boy...so am I CUT TO: EXT. BAG END -- DAY Wide on: GANDALF'S CART pulls up outside the gate to BAG END...a particularly fine example of a Hobbit hole, with a large round front door set into a grassy hillside. There is a sign on the gate which reads: "NO ADMITTANCE EXCEPT ON PARTY BUSINESS." Gandalf strides up to the garden path of Bag End. He raises his staff and raps on the front door...a voice calls out:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, thank you! We don't want any more visitors, well wishers, or distant relations.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And what about very old friends? Suddenly the door opens and BILBO BAGGINS stands before him. He is a HOBBIT OF INDERTIMINATE AGE, with a mischievous Twinkle in his eye. Wearing a dashing brocade waist coat, he looks every inch the eccentric gentleman. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gandalf?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bilbo Baggins!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My dear Gandalf! Gandalf drops to his knee to embrace his old friend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's good to see you. One hundred and eleven years old, who would believe it! Gandalf looks at him more keenly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You haven't aged a day! Gandalf and Bilbo laugh together and enter Bag End.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, come in!   Welcome, welcome!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BAG END LIVING ROOM -- DAY Bilbo leads Gandalf into Bag End...cozy and cluttered with souvenirs of Bilbo's travels. Gandalf has to stoop to avoid hitting his head on the low ceiling. Bilbo hangs up Gandalf's hat on a peg and trots off down the hall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Calling) Tea? Or maybe something stronger... I've a few bottles of the Old Winyard left,
direction.name: direction

result.heading: SCREAMING VILLAGERS, MEN, WOMEN, AND CHILDREN, RUN
THE HUGE, DARK FIGURE OF SARURON,
BLACK MACE OF SAURON LASHES OUT

direction.raw_text: ...a very good year, almost as old as I am. It was laid down by my father. What say we open one, eh? Bilbo disappears into the kitchen as Gandalf looks around..enjoying the familiarity of Bag End...he turns, knocking his head on the light and then walking into the wooden beam. He groans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was expecting you some time last week. Not that it matters, you come and go as you please, always have done, always will. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've caught me a bit unprepared, I'm afraid...we've only got cold chicken, bit of pickle, some cheese here...ooh, no, that might be a little risky... Gandalf stops in front of a framed map, charred in one corner...it is Thorin's map of the Lonely Mountain, Gandalf smiles to himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Er, we've got raspberry jam and apple tart...got some custard somewhere. Not much for Afters, I'm afraid. Oh no...we're alright...I've just found some sponge cake. Nice little snack. Hope it's enough. (comes into view) I could do you some eggs if you like? Bilbo jumps, a half eaten pork pie in his hand, as Gandalf mysteriously appears behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just tea, thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh..right.     You don't mind if...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, not at all. Go ahead. A sudden loud knock on the front door. MRS. SACKVILLE BAGGINS (O.S.) Bilbo Baggins, you open this door..I know you're in there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not home. Gandalf watches, amused as Bilbo tries to hide.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got to get away from these confounded relatives, hanging on the bell all day, never giving me a moment's peace. I want to see mountains again...mountains, Gandalf... and then find somewhere quiet where I can finish my book...Oh, Tea!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, you mean to go through with your plan, then? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, yes...it's all inhand.   All the arrangements are made.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Frodo suspects something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'Course he does, he's a Baggins...not some block headed Bracegirdle from Hardbottle!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You will tell him, won't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's very fond of you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. He'd probably come with me if I asked him. I think, in his heart, Frodo's still in love with the Shire, the woods and the fields... little rivers. Bilbo stands gazing out of the kitchen window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am old, Gandalf... Bilbo looks at Gandalf sadly...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know I don't look it, but I'm beginning to feel it in my heart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON: Bilbo's fingers close around his waistcoat pocket...gripping a small, unseen object.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I feel thin...sort of stretched, like butter scraped over too much bread. I need a holiday...a very long holiday and I don't expect I shall return...in fact, I mean not to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 14. INT. BAG END -- EVENING Gandalf and Bilbo are sitting on the Bag End porch. Below them, final preparations are being made on the Party field. Bilbo strikes a match and lights his pipe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Old Toby, the finest weed in Southfarthing! Bilbo blows a perfect smoke ring and watches it rise into the air. A tiny sailing ship with masts and sails glides through the Center of Bilbo's smoke ring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ohhhh, (smiles) Gandalf my old friend...this will be a night to remember!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. PARTY FIELD, HOBBITON -- NIGHT BOOM! A FIREWORK explodes into the night sky high above Hobbiton...in the shape of a great green tree with unfolding branches. TILT DOWN: with glowing flowers as they rain down from the branches...evaporating just above the up turned faces of the delighted party-goers 144 Hobbits, feasting and drinking Carts of beer and wine are scattered about, and the tables are piled high with steaming scones and savories. Gandalf hurries about, lighting fireworks with a blue spark that dances magically from his staff... Bilbo is greeting visitors. Frodo and SAM sit at a table drinking ale...Frodo notices Sam's eyes keep flicking to another pretty Hobbit, Rosie Cotton, sitting some distance away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go on, Sam, ask Rosie for a dance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (horrified) I think I'll just have myself another ale.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, no you don't. Go on. Sam goes to drain his glass... suddenly it is snatched out of his hands as Frodo thrusts him into the middle of a passing throng of dancers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ANGLE ON: SAM'S HORRIFIED FACE as he is Swept away.   Frodo laughs and finishes Sam's beer. ANGLE ON: Gandalf as he sets alight a particularly spectacular firework that draws gasps of admiration from the party guests. Close on: Bilbo is relating stories of his adventure to a group of young hobbit children.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (melodramatic) So, there I was...at the mercy of three monstrous trolls...Have you ever heard of a troll? Do you know what a Troll is? Great big nasty twenty foot high smelly things..and they're arguing...arguing about how they were going to cook us! ANGLE ON: A LITTLE HOBBIT GIRL'S upturned face...her eyes growing larger and larger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whether it be turned on a spit or minced in a pie or whether they were going to sit on us one by one and squash us into jelly! But they spent so long arguing the whether-to's and why-for's that the sun's first light crept over the top of the trees...and turned them all to stone! STUNNED GASPS from his young Audience greet his astonishing feat! Close on: MERRY AND PIPPIN, two mischievous Young Hobbits in their late teens. Pippin scrambles on to the back of Gandalf's wagon, snatching up a small firework
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (urgent whisper) No, no..the big one...the big one! Pippin grabs a huge rocket. CLOSE ON: FIREWORK FUSE crackles with flame! Merry is holding out the big rocket...he looks aghast at the fizzing fuse that Pippin has just lit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (worried whisper) You're supposed to stick it in the ground! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is in the ground. Merry fearfully tosses the Rocket to Pippin!    The fuse sizzles angrily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Outside!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was your idea. Pippin attempts to throw the fizzing rocket back to Merry. WHOOSH! The two hobbits are suddenly blown off their feet in a shower of sparks as the rocket blasts off with frightening power. The ROCKET ZOOMS over the Party..It suddenly bursts apart, forming the shape of a great red golden Dragon! Fire gushes from its nostrils as it turns back and Flies low towards the startled crowd. Close on: Frodo watches the Fireworks Dragon with alarm...but Bilbo is oblivious to the Panicking crowd and impending danger!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bilbo!   Watch out for the dragon!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dragon? Nonsense...hasn1t been a dragon in these parts for a thousand years! ANGLE ON: FRODO As he hurriedly pulls Bilbo to the ground, just as the dragon roars a few feet above their heads like a flaming express train! Hobbits dive to the ground, tables overturn, tents collapse, food flies everywhere. The fireworks dragon turns a somersault and explodes over the hills with a deafening bang! This gets the biggest Cheer of the night. ANGLE ON: MERRY AND PIPPIN, clothes and hair smoking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was good!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's get another one! LARGE HANDS suddenly clamp down on Merry and Pippin's ears. Low angle: Gandalf looking DOWN STERNLY! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Meridoc Brandybuck and Peregrin Took...I might have known!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : MERRY AND PIPPIN Are leaning over a barrel, washing dishes in soapy water...with Gandalf sitting nearby, smoking his pipe and sipping an ale. Cries of "SPEECH! SPEECH" erupt from the party. ANGLE ON: Bilbo stepping on a stool...he bows in gratitude at the applause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Speech!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (clearing throat) My dear Bagginses, and Boffins, tooks and Brandybucks...Grubbs, Chubbs, Hornblowers, Bolgers, Bracegirdles and Proudfoots... ANGLE ON: A HOBBIT WITH PARTICULARLY BIG FEET ODO PROUDFOOT Proudfeet!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Today is my one hundred and eleventh birthday. Yes, and alas...Eleventy- one years is far too short a time to live among such excellent and admirable Hobbits! Tremendous outburst of approval!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know half of you half as well as I should like; and I like less than half of you as well as well as you deserve. SCATTERED CLAPPING as the guests try to work out if that was a compliment or not. CLOSE ON: FRODO AND GANDALF smiling to themselves. CLOSE ON: Bilbo...a strange hum seems to fill his head. A bead of sweat rolls down his brow. Bilbo's hand pulls something out of his waistcoat pocket and holds it behind his back. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have..things to do and I have put this off for far too long... CLOSE ON: BILBO'S knuckles turn white as he tightens his grip on the small object behind his back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I regret to announce, this is the end. I am going now. I bid you all a very fond farewell!! Bilbo looks across at Frodo, hesitates... then...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whisper) Goodbye. Bilbo instantly vanishes. The party explodes into an uproar... the crowd leaps to its feet. ANGLE ON: FRODO staring at the empty stool in disbelief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. BAG END -- NIGHT The party is still in an excited uproar... some 50 yards away as we pan across a moonlit lane to the front door of Bag End. Door opens, pulled by an invisible hand. INT. BAG END -- NIGHT The door quietly closes...Bilbo materializes as he pulls a plain gold ring off his finger. Bilbo laughs as he tosses the ring in the air, then places it in his pocket. ANGLE ON: Bilbo emerges from the passage, carrying a walking stick. He finds Gandalf looming over him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I suppose you think that was terribly clever?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, Gandalf!   Did you see their faces? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are many magic rings in the world, Bilbo Baggins, and none of them should be used lightly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was just a bit of fun.   Oh, you're probably right as usual.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You will keep an eye on Frodo, won't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm leaving everything to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about this ring of yours?   Is that staying too? Close on: Bilbo...he gives Gandalf a look and nods toward the mantelpiece.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, yes, it's in an envelope...over there on the mantelpiece. Gandalf frowns at the empty mantelpiece...Bilbo suddenly feels his waistcoat with a look of guilty surprise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, wait. It's here in my pocket. Isn't that...isn't' that odd now? Yet, after all, why not? Why shouldn't I keep it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you should leave the Ring behind, Bilbo. Is that so hard?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, no...and yes. Now it comes to it, I don't feel like parting with it. It's mine. I found it. It came to me! ANGLE ON: GANDALF LOOKS DOWN AT BILBO WITH RISING CONCERN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's no need to get angry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, if I'm angry, it's your fault! It's mine. My own, my precious. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Precious? It's been called that before, but not by you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So? What business is it of yours what I do with my own things? Bilbo's voice, shape and manner have suddenly changed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you've had that ring quite long enough.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want it for yourself! Gandalf rises to his full height, his eyes flash, his shadow suddenly seems to fill the room
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bilbo Baggins do not take me for some conjurer of cheap tricks! Bilbo cowers from Gandalf, disarmed by his power...a frightened Hobbit. Gandalf's expression softens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am not trying to rob you. I am trying to help you. Sobbing, Bilbo runs to Gandalf and hugs him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All you long years we've been friends...trust me as you once did. Let it go!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're right, Gandalf...the ring must go to Frodo. Bilbo lifts his knapsack and heads for the front door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's late, the road is long... yes, it is time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bilbo?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hmmm? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ring is still in your pocket. Bilbo hesitates...reaches into his pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yes. CLOSE ON: Bilbo pulls out the ring...he stares at it in his palm. With all his will power, Bilbo allows the ring to slowly slide off his palm and drop to the floor. CLOSE ON: The tiny ring lands with a heavy thud on the wooden floor. EXT. BAG END -- NIGHT ANGLE ON: Bilbo staggering out of Bag end...he braces himself in the night air, Pale and Trembling, as if his loss of the ring has weakened him. Gandalf steps up behind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've thought up and ending for my book..."And he lived happily ever after to the end of his days."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sure you will, my dear friend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goodbye, Gandalf.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goodbye Bilbo. Bilbo walks away from Bag End, disappearing into the night, softly singing: "The Road goes on and on."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (softly) Until our next meeting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BAG END LIVING ROOM -- NIGHT CLOSE ON: THE RING...Glinting on the floor...Gandalf circles around it, a Puzzled look on his face. Gandalf slowly reaches for the ring. His fingers barely touch the ring...the creepy Hum rises on the soundtrack. Gandalf is sitting in front of the fire, with his pipe...staring into the flickering flames. (CONTINUED) 22. CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's mine, my own, my precious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to himself) Riddles in the dark.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bilbo! Bilbo! Frodo rushes into Bag End...he stops and picks up the ring at his feet. Gandalf continues staring into the fire, as if locked in thought.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to himself) My precious...precious..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quietly) He's gone, hasn't he? Frodo steps into the living room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He talked for so long about leaving...I didn't think he'd really do it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (mutters to himself) ...my own.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gandalf? Gandalf turns...his eyes locking onto the ring in Frodo's fingers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bilbo's ring. Gandalf sorts hurriedly through Bilbo's papers...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's gone to stay with the Elves. He's left you Bag End... Gandalf holds out the envelope...Frodo drops the ring into it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...along with all his possessions. Gandolf seals the envelope with wax.   He hands it to Frodo. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ring is yours now. But it somewhere out of sight. Gandalf rises hurriedly and starts to gather his things.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have some things I must see to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What things?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Questions.     Questions that need answering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've only just arrived!    I don't understand... Gandalf is already at the door, he turns to Frodo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Neither do I. Keep it secret, keep it safe. Gandalf hurries out the door...leaving FRODO standing alone in the Bag End. ANGLE ON: THE ENVELOPE The camera pushes in...the hum of the ring comes up on the soundtrack. The camera pushes through the white paper to the ring...beneath the hum the whispered murmur of BLACK SPEECH can be heard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. BARAD-DUR -- NIGHT The jagged ruins of" BARAD-DUR. THE DARK TOWER! TEASING IMAGES: THE HUGE DARK TOWER OF BARAD-DUR is being rebuilt! Thousands of ORCS crawl over the surface, hauling stone and iron up the towering heights. WIDE ON: MOUNT DOOM...A HUGE, BILLOWING CLOUD OF BLACK FILTH grows and spreads across the red streaked sky...casting a shadowy pall over the nightmarish landscape. (CONTINUED) 24. CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Baggins!    Shire!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. MINAS MORGUL -- NIGHT NINE BLACK RIDERS burst out of Minas Morgul and charge toward Camera. EXT. THE WEST ROAD, GONDOR -- DAY WIDE ON: A LONE HORSEMAN gallops to the crest of a hill on the west road. The main highway south to Minas Tirith...he looks toward the saw toothed mountains of Mordor... ...seeping out across the blood red sky, his face grave. He spurs his horse on. CUT TO: INT. CITADEL, MINAS TIRITH -- NIGHT ANGLE ON: GANDALF making is way down into the lower depths of the Citidel. CUT TO: INT. CITADEL CHAMBER, MINAS TIRITH -- NIGHT CLOSE ON: Pages flipping as Gandalf searches ancient scrolls and books placed high on a wooden table. His eyes settle on one old parchment. He murmurs hurriedly to himself, reading.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (reading) The year 3434 of the Second Age...here follows the account of Isildur, High King of Gondor, and the finding of the ring of power.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : CLOSE ON: ISILDUR, TRIUMPHANT, REACHES FOR THE ONE RING, HIS EYES FIXATED ON IT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (reading) It has come to me...the ring of power! (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It shall be an heirloom of my Kingdom...all those who follow in my bloodline shall be bound to its fate, for I will risk no hurt to the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ring...it is precious to me, though I buy it with great pain... CLOSE ON: ELVISH LETTERING MARKS ON THE FADED OLD DOCUMENT IN GANDALF'S HAND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (reading) The marking upon the band begin to fade...the writing which at first was as clear as red flame, has all but disappeared...a secret now that only fire can tell...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. HOBBIT FARMHOUSE -- EVENING FARMER MAGGOT is chopping wood in his garden CLOSE ON: SNORTING HORSE NOSTRILS...as the shadow of a black rider looms over a Hobbit House. Terrified, FARMER MAGGOT cowers in his doorway...FANG, his dog, Whimpers and backs away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (hissing) Shire? Baggins?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (terrified) There's no Bagginses around here! They are all up in Hobbiton...that way. The BLACK RIDER GALLOPS AWAY AT SPEED CUT TO: INT. GREEN DRAGON INN -- NIGHT ANGLE ON: ROSIE COTTON bids the last of the Patron's "Goodnight"...Sam meets her eyes for a moment as he and Frodo leave the inn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. BAG END -- NIGHT WIDE ON: FRODO FAREWELLS SAM outside Bag End, and heads towards the front door. Creepy POV from inside Bag end: Frodo coming up the path. CUT TO: INT. BAG END HALLWAY -- NIGHT ANGLE ON: FRODO enters Bag End...he immediately Pauses, sensing that something is amiss. All is quiet...Frodo peers uneasily into the darkened living room. SUDDENLY! A large figure looms out of the shadows, reaching for Frodo. Frodo lets out a startled cry, pulls himself free and spins around to face his Assailant. Gandalf steps into a shaft of moonlight. Paranoia blazes in his eyes. His clothes are dirty and ragged from much traveling. Hair and beard much longer an unkempt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (urgent whisper) Is it secret? Is it safe?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BAG END LIVING ROOM -- NIGHT Frodo pulls the envelope out of an old chest. Gandalf, suspicious, Alert. Without a word, Gandalf takes the envelope and tosses it into the fireplace!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (bewildered) What are you doing? Flames instantly consume the envelope...revealing the ring, as it sinks into the red hot embers. Gandalf reaches into the fire with a pair of tongs...he lifts the ring out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold out your hand, Frodo...it is quite cool. Gandalf drops the ring into Frodo's hand...he reacts to its weight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What can you see? Can you see anything?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing...there's nothing.   Wait... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: CLOSE ON: The Gold Band of the ring as fiery letters begin to appear...a tiny inscription glows red...as if burning from within.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...these are markings. CLOSE ON: GANDALF...STILL...TENSE
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's some form of Elvish...I can't read it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (ominous) There are few who can...the language is that of Mordor, which I will not utter here. Mordor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the common tongue it says, "One ring to rule them all, One ring to find them, One ring to bring them all, and in the darkness bind them."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BAG END KITCHEN -- NIGHT CLOSE ON: The ring lies on Frodo's simple kitchen table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is the one ring forged by the dark lord, Sauron, in the fires of Mt Doom...taken by Isildur from the hand of Sauron himself. CLOSE ON: FRODO...STUNNED
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quiet realization) Bilbo found it...in Gollom's cave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For sixty years the ring lay quiet in Bilbo's keeping, prolonging his life, delaying old age...but no longer, Frodo. Evil is stirring in Mordor. The ring has awoken. It has heard its master's call. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: AT THAT MOMENT: A FLEETING, LOW WHISPER of BLACK SPEECH emanates from the Ring.   Frodo looks at Gandalf, each knowing the other has heard it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But he was destroyed...Sauron was destroyed. ANGLE ON: THE RING lies between them on the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, Frodo. The spirit of Sauron has endured. His life force is bound to the ring and the ring survived. Sauron has returned. His Orcs have multiplied...his fortress of Barad- dur is rebuilt in the land of Mordor. Sauron needs only this ring to cover all the lands in the second darkness. He is seeking it, seeking it, all his thought is bent on it. For the ring yearns, above all else, to return to the hand of its master: they are one, the ring and the dark lord. Frodo, he must never find out. SUDDENLY Frodo scoops up the Ring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BAG END LIVING ROOM -- NIGHT ANGLE ON: FRODO hurriedly entering the living room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (thinking fast) We put it away, we keep it hidden! We never speak of it again. No one know it's here, do they? Gandalf shifts uncomfortably.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do they, Gandalf? Gandalf looks at Frodo, sadly... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is one other who knew that Bilbo had the Ring. I looked everywhere for the creature Gollum, but the enemy found him first.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BARAD-DUR -- NIGHT CLOSE ON: A teasing Glimpse of Gollum being tortured by the Orcs. The wretched creature screams in pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know how long they tortured him...but amidst the endless screams and inane babble, they discerned two words.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (screaming) S...Shire! Baggins!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BAG END LIVING ROOM -- NIGHT CLOSE ON: FRODO'S HORRIFIED FACE!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shire!   Baggins!   That will lead them here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. SHIRE LANE, SOUTH FARTHING -- NIGHT IMAGE: On a dark country lane, a Hobbit bounder lifts his watch lantern in alarm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Halt!    Who goes there? Out of the darkness thunder two BLACK RIDERS...A LETHAL SWORD swings down at the small Hobbit bounder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BAG END LIVING ROOM -- NIGHT FRODO thrusts the ring at Gandalf.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take it!   Take it! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, Frodo...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must take it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You cannot offer me this ring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm giving it to you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't tempt me, Frodo. I dare not take it, not even to keep it safe. CLOSE ON: THE RING IN FRODO'S HAND...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Understand, Frodo...I would use this Ring from a desire to do good...but through me, it would wield a power too great and terrible to imagine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But it cannot stay in the Shire!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no it can't. CLOSE ON: THE RING IN FRODO'S CLENCHED HAND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What must I do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. FRODO'S BEDROOM -- NIGHT ANGLE ON: FRODO throwing clothes into a knapsack...Gandalf watches him, making plans...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must leave, and leave quickly. Get out of the Shire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where?   Where shall I go?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Make for the village of Bree. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bree?   What about you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will, be waiting for you at the Inn of the Prancing Pony. Frodo packs his food into his knapsack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And the ring will be safe there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know, Frodo. I don't have any answers. I must see the Head of my Order. He is both wise and powerful. Trust me, Frodo. He'll know what to go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BAG END LIVING ROOM -- NIGHT Frodo is preparing to leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll have to leave the name of Baggins behind you...for that name is not safe outside the Shire. GANDALF helps FRODO into his coat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Travel only by day and stay off the road.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (thinking) I can cut across country easily enough. Gandalf looks at the young Hobbit, moved by his courage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My dear Frodo, Hobbits really are amazing creatures. You can learn all that there is to know about their ways in a month, and yet, after a hundred years, they can still surprise you. SUDDENLY!    A SOUND from outside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get down! GANDALF FREEZES... he moves quietly towards the window, eyes wide with tension. He raises his staff above the window, and slams it down on the intruder. THERE IS A YELP OF PAIN! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: Gandalf hauls a small figure into the room...SAM GAMGEE sprawls across the floor! He looks up in terror as Gandalf looms over him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (angry) Confound it all! Samwise Gamgee, have you been eavesdropping?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I ain't been dropping no eaves, sir! Honest. I was just cutting the grass under the window there, if you follow me...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a little late for trimming the hedges, don't you think?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I heard raised voices...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did you hear?   Speak!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (panicked) Nothing important...that is, I heard a good deal about a ring...and a Dark Lord. And something about the end of the world, but...Please, Mr. Gandalf, sir, don't hurt me! Don't turn me into anything unnatural!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No? FRODO SMILES GANDALF Perhaps not. I've thought of a better use for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. HOBBITON FIELDS -- PRE DAWN Wide on: HOBBITON...shrouded in a white veil of MIST. WIDER: To reveal Gandalf, Frodo and Sam hurrying across a ploughed field, away from Hobbiton! Gandalf leads his Horse...Frodo and Sam are carrying knapsacks. (CONTINUED) 33. CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come along, Samwise...keep up...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. HOBBITON WOODS -- DAY Gandalf leads Frodo and Sam under the cover of Woods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be careful, both of you. The Enemy has many spies in his service, many ways of hearing...birds, beasts... Gandalf takes Frodo to one side...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (low voice) Is it safe? FRODO NODS...he pats his pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never put it on, for then the agents of the Dark Lord will be drawn to its power...Always remember, Frodo, the ring is trying to get back to its master...it wants to be found. Gandalf wheels his horse and gallops away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. GREEN HILL COUNTRY -- DAY MONTAGE: FRODO AND SAM hiking over the gentle Shire Countryside...wading through a shallow stream...heating a kettle over a small fire...clambering over stone walls. CUT TO: EXT. GREEN HILL COUNTRY -- AFTERNOON Sam stops short...taking stock of his surroundings.    Sam looks back from where they came.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is what? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I take one more step it'll be the farthest away from home I've ever been. FRODO gives Sam a pat on the shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, Sam. Sam takes a deep breath and steps forward. CLOSE ON: SAM'S brown, furry foot hits the ground. FRODO IS SMILING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remember what Bilbo used to say...it's a dangerous business... Frodo and Sam continue their journey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... it's a dangerous business, Frodo, going out your door...you step onto the road, and if you don't keep your feet, there's not knowing where you might be swept off to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. ISENGARD VALLEY -- DAY Gandalf is galloping along the outskirts of the ancient forest of Fangorn. Nestled in a basin at the foot of the distant Misty Mountains, the tall black tower of Orthanc is clearly visible EXT. ISENGARD VALLEY -- DAY Gandalf gallops through the gate, into the fortress of ISENGARD...a great ring-wall of stone, a mile from rim to rim, encloses beautiful trees and gardens, watered by streams that flow down from the mountains.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Smoke rises once more from the mountain of doom...the shadow takes shape in the darkness of Mordor; the hour grows late...and Gandalf the Grey rides to Isengard seeking my counsel... The strange tower of Orthanc...hewn from a solid pillar of black obsidian...rises up in the center of the Isengard Circle. Gandalf arrives at the foot of the Orthanc Stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ANGLE ON: SARUMAN, THE WHITE WIZARD he sweeps down the Orthanc stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For that is why you have come, is it not, my old friend? Gandalf moves quickly towards him, grimy and weary from his long ride.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Saruman!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. ISENGARD GARDENS -- DAY Gandalf and Saruman walk slowly between the beautiful trees of Isengard, Saruman's clean, white robe contrasts with Gandalf's dusty grey robes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you sure of this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beyond any doubt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So the ring of power has been found?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All these long years it was in the Shire, under my very nose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And yet you did not have the wit to see it! Your love of the Halfling's leaf has clearly slowed your mind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We still have time...time enough to counter Sauron...if we act quickly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Time?   What time do you think we have?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. ORTHANC ANTE-CHAMBER -- DAY Saruman and Gandalf are seated in a small, cluttered room to the side of the cavernous central chamber. (CONTINUED) 36. CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sauron has regained much of his former strength. He cannot yet take physical form...but his spirit has lost none of its potency. Concealed within his fortress, the lord of Mordor sees all. His gaze pierces cloud, shadow, earth, and flesh. You know of what I speak, Gandalf...a great Eye, lidless, wreathed in flame.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (softly) The eye of Sauron.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He is gathering all evil to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very soon he will have summoned an army great enough to launch an assault upon Middle earth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know this? How?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have seen it. Gandalf and Saruman stride through Orthanc toward a stone plinth on which a sphere like shape is draped with a cloth...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A palantir is a dangerous tool, Saruman. Saruman lifts the cloth to reveal the Palantir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?   Why should we fear to use it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They are not all accounted for, the lost seeing-stones...we do not know who else may be watching. Gandalf throws the cloth back over the Palantir. FLASH IMAGE: A FIERY EYE! Saruman sits upon his throne. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The hour is later than you think. Sauron's forces are already moving...the Nine have left Minas Morgul.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shocked) The nine!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They crossed the river Isen in Midsummer's eve, disguised as riders in black.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (alarmed) They have reached the Shire? Saruman shrugs...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They will find the ring...and kill the one who carries it. Gandalf backs away and turns to run to the door...horrified as the doors suddenly slam shut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You did not seriously think a Hobbit could contend with the will of Sauron? There are none who can. Gandalf slowly turns to Saruman...a look of dawning horror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Against the power of Mordor, there can be no victory. We must join with him, Gandalf. We must join with Sauron. It would be wise, my friend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (deadly) Tell me, friend, when did Saruman the wise abandon reason for madness? At that moment: Gandalf is suddenly blasted across the room! He slams against the wall...pinned there by some unseen force. With sudden effort, Gandalf wrenches himself off the wall and swings his staff on Saruman...blasting him off his feet! Gandalf and Saruman battle, powerful blasts throwing them across the room. SARUMAN SCREAMS, EYES BLAZING! Gandalf's staff is suddenly wrenched from his grasp...it flies across the chamber into Saruman's hand! Gandalf is flung to the floor. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I gave you the chance of aiding me willingly, but you have elected the way of pain. Gandalf is breathing hard on the floor, his eyes look into the madness of Saruman... Commanding two staffs, Saruman sends Gandalf into a sickening spin. Gandalf tumbles towards the top of the chamber...as if falling in reverse. Rushing POV: the roof of Orthanc rockets toward camera.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. FARMER'S FIELDS -- DAY Wide on: Frodo and Sam walking along a country lane which borders Farmer Maggot's Fields. Sam is looking up...Frodo has disappeared around a corner in the lane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (panicked) Mr. Frodo. Mr. Frodo! Frodo turns, surprised as Sam comes running towards him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (worried) I thought I lost you. Frodo looks at Sam suspiciously. Sam glances down, embarrassed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (teasing) What are you talking about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (mumbling) It's just something Gandalf said...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did he say?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He said..."Don't you leave him, Samwise Gamgee." (looks at Frodo intently) And I don't mean to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (laughing) Sam...we're still in the Shire...what could possibly happen? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: SUDDENLY! A figure comes crashing out of a hedgerow sending Frodo flying. Frodo picks himself up, only to be knocked back down again by Pippin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Frodo!   Merry, it's Frodo Baggins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello Frodo Merry, Pippin, and Frodo picking themselves up... a variety of vegetables have scattered everywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the meaning of this!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sam, hold this... Merry gives Sam a large cabbage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (accusing) You've been into Farmer Maggot's crop! A large pitchfork can be seen racing towards them along the Hedgerow...angry shouts from Farmer Maggot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's that in my field!     Get out of it! Get out of my field, you    young varmits! I'll show you...get out    of my corn. Merry and Pippin hurriedly gather their booty and race away...with Frodo and Sam on their heels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looking behind him) I don't know why he's so upset, it's only a couple of carrots.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And some cabbages...and those three bags of potatoes that we lifted last week. And then the mushrooms the week before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, Pippin, my point is, he's clearly over reacting. The BAYING OF LARGE DOGS sounds! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Run!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. WOODED ROAD -- DAY Frodo, Sam, and Merry and Pippin tumble head over heels down a bank, onto a dark, wooded road. CLOSE ON: A winded Pippin, his face inches away from a large pile of Horse droppings...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was close. Frodo picks himself up and looks around quickly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (groaning) Ow...I think I've broken something. Pulls a LARGE CARROT, almost broken through in the middle, out from his back pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (turning on Merry and Pippin) Trust a Brandybuck and a Took.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? That was just a detour...a shortcut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A shortcut to what? Pippin has spied something under the trees on the far side of the road.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (excited) Mushrooms! CLOSE ON: SMALL, brown mushrooms growing amongst the Loamy undergrowth. Sam, Merry, and Pippin race toward the mushrooms! Frodo is tense and watchful. He realizes they are on a wooded road. Scattered leaves rise into the air Whirling down the road as if blown by an invisible wind...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SUDDENLY... THE SOUND OF HORSES HOOVES...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think we should get off the road. A long drawn WAIL comes down the wind, like the cry of some evil and lonely creature.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (more urgency) Get off the road! Sam grabs Merry and Pippin as the Hobbits quickly scramble down the bank, hiding under a mossy log. THE SOUND OF HOOVES is close... A sinister MOUNTED RINGWRATH steps into view...hooded and faceless, mounted on a huge snarling black horse with insane eyes ! Frodo freezes in terror. The RINGWRAITH pauses right beside their hiding place...he sits very still with his head bowed, listening. From inside the hood comes a sniffing noise as if he is trying to catch an elusive scent; his head turning from side to side. CLOSE ON: FRODO Beads of sweat gather on his brow. The ringwraith suddenly slides off his horse, leaning over the mossy log, peering suspiciously into the woods. CLOSE ON: FRODO He is drawing the ring out of his pocket, with trembling hands...his face fevered and sweating as if in the grip of some terrible INTERNAL STRUGGLE. The SOUND OF SNIFFING intensifies as the ringwraith darts his head from side to side like a bird of party. CLOSE ON: FRODO SQUEEZING HIS EYES SHUT... QUICK PSYCHIC BLASTS!   AND EVIL DARK TOWER...A GREAT EYE...A BURST OF FLAME. ANGLE ON:   SAM LOOKING AT FRODO WITH CONCERN SAM Frodo? Merry desperately hurls the mushrooms across the road...the ringwraith spins around at the sound, and darts to the far side of the road with frightening speed. Frodo instantly slumps...as if a PSYCHIC LINK had been broken (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What was that? Frodo is staring, a look of shock on his face at the ring lying in the palm of his hand. EXT. FERRY LANE -- NIGHT Frodo, Sam, Merry, and Pippin hurry through the trees...slipping and sliding on the muddy ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anything?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is going on? Merry moves past pippin, toward Frodo, watching intently...Sam keeps looking around nervously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Black rider was looking for something...or someone...Frodo?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get down! The SILHOUETTE OF A BLACK RIDER looms against the skyline. The Four Hobbits... sprawled on the ground, holding their breath. The BLACK RIDER turns and departs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have to leave the Shire...Sam and I must get to Bree. Merry looks at his friend...realizing Frodo is in deep trouble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right...Buckleberry Ferry...follow me ! The Hobbits break cover. SUDDENLY, A RINGWRAITH bursts out of the forest TOWARD THEM!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's another one!! Frodo, this way! ! The Hobbits run   THE RINGWRAITH SHRIEKS!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : (CONTINUED) 43. CONTINUED: Black horse hooves... snarling horse mouths...a fleeting black cowl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Frodo, follow me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. BUCKLEBERRY FERRY -- NIGHT FRODO, SAM, MERRY AND PIPPIN, are running towards the wide, placid Brandywine river...and the FERRY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get the ropes, Sam. QUICK ANGLES: STOMPING HOOVES...SNARLING HORSES... Four RINGWRAITHS are speeding through the Fog...converging on the FERRY CROSSING. The HOBBITS stampede across the Wharf and Tumble onto the Ferry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (screaming) Frodo! Frodo races across the Wooden Wharf, followed by the ringwraiths. He leaps into the Ferry. CLOSE ON: HOOVES THUNDER DOWN THE WOODEN WHARF! Sam and Merry shove off with the poles...the ferry slides out into the river, just as the ringwraiths arrive. They pull up on the end of the wharf... shrieking with rage! The Hobbits cover their ears. The Ringwraiths wheel their horses towards the north and Gallop away along the river bank, quickly disappearing into the fog.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How far to the nearest crossing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The brandwine bridge...twenty miles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. BREE GATE -- NIGHT ANGLE ON: Lights of Bree...a small village of stone and half timbered houses nestled against a low wooded hill. (CONTINUED) 44. CONTINUED: A thick hedge surrounds the village...a great gate bars the western entrance. CLOSE ON: FRODO, SAM, MERRY AND PIPPIN approaching the gatehouse...wild eyes, ragged, and out of breath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. A SURLY GATEKEEPER glances down at them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you want?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're headed for the prancing pony. The gatekeeper swings his lantern onto the hobbits, bathing them in an uncomfortable yellow spotlight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hobbits! Four Hobbits, and what's more, out of the Shire by your talk. What business brings you to Bree?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We wish to stay at the inn...our business is our own. To Frodo's relief, the Gatekeeper unlocks the gate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, young sir, I meant no offense. The Hobbits gratefully enter Bree...the gatekeeper eyeing them curiously in the lantern light.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's my job to ask questions after nightfall. There's talk of strange fold abroad...can't be too careful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. BREE STREETS -- NIGHT The tall BREE FOLK loom over the nervous little hobbits as Frodo, Sam, Merry and Pippin make their way through the Narrow Streets. Tall buildings tower above them...lights glow dimly from behind thick curtains. (CONTINUED) 45. CONTINUED: Close on: The sign of the "PRANCING PONY INN"...Frodo, Sam, Merry, and Pippin hurry toward it. CUT TO: INT. "PRANCING PONY" RECEPTION -- NIGHT Frodo, Sam, Merry and Pippin come rushing in.   Frodo attracts the INN KEEPERS'S attention.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good evening, little masters. If you're seeking accommodation, we've got some nice, cozy Hobbit sized rooms available, Mr...ah...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Underhill...my name's Underbill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Underhill?     Hmmmm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're friends of Gandalf the Grey...can you tell him we've arrived? BUTTERBUR frowns...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Puzzled) Gandalf...Gandalf...Oh... (recognition) Oh yes! I remember...elderly chap...big grey beard...pointy hat? Frodo nods with relief...Butterbur shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not seen him for six months. Frodo is shocked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (worried whisper) What do we do now? INT. PRANCING PONY INN -- NIGHT Wide on: the noise, smokey Inn. It is dimly lit, cheifly from a blazing log fire...and crowded with a mixture of BIG FOLK, LOCAL HOBBITS, and a couple of dwarfs. Frodo, Sam, Merry and Pippin are sitting at a table against the wall... clearly trying to remain Quiet and inconspicuous... Sam can't help himself...he keeps casting nervous glances around. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sam, he'll be here.    He'll come. Merry ploinks himself down at a table, carrying a very large mug of beer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This, my friend, is a pint.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It comes in pints?    I'm getting one! Sam watches Pippin rise unsteadily to his feet and head to the bar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've had a whole half already. Merry watches Pippin go. A COUPLE OF SWARTHY MEN leaning against the bar glance at Frodo, then quickly look away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (tense) That fellow's done nothing but stare at you since we've arrived. Sam indicates a BROODING STRANGER who sits alone at a table in the far corner, smoking a curiously carved long stemmed pipe, peering from beneath a travel stained cowl with gleaming eyes. Frodo gestures to Butterbur...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me, that man in the corner, who is he?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's one of them Rangers; they're dangerous folk they are, wandering the wilds. What his right name is, I never heard, but round here he's known as Strider.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to himself) Strider. BENEATH TABLE: FRODO'S fingers are nervously TOYING WITH THE RING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CLOSE ON: FRODO Sweat runs down his brow.   The Strange hum of the Ring spills into the Soundtrack. "Baggins...Baggins..." a creepy whisper seems to fill Frodo's head...sound that dissolves into Pippin's loud voice:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Baggins? Sure, I know a Baggins...he's over there... ANGLE ON: PIPPIN sitting at the bar, chatting with Locals.   Frodo leaps to his feet and pushes his way towards the bar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (loudly) Frodo Baggins. He's my second cousin once removed, on his mother's side and my third cousin twice removed on his father's side...if you follow me. Frodo grabs Pippin's sleeve, spilling his beer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pippin!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Steady on, Frodo! Pippin pushes Frodo away...he stumbles backwards, and falls to the floor. At that instant, the Inn goes silent and all the attention turns to Frodo...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON: The ring...in agonizing Slow motion we watch as it seems to hang in the air for a split second...then crashes down onto his out stretched finger. FRODO VANISHES! There is a sharp intake of breath...followed by total silence. CUT TO: EXT. BREE COUNTRYSIDE -- NIGHT The RINGWRAITHS turn sharply in their saddles...Instantly aware that the ring is being worn. They spur their horses towards the distant lights of Bree. 48. INT. "PRANCING PONY" INN -- NIGHT Sam looks sick; Pippin instantly sobers, realizing his folly; the brooding stranger frowns...and the inn erupts into excited babble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON: FRODO: as he finds himself in the TWILIGHT WORLD of the ring: THE EXCITED CROWD ARE suddenly moving in slow motion...distorted voices...a weird photographic negative quality. FRODO is moving in real time; against the slow motion background. He suddenly clutches his head as he is hit with quick images...of a GREAT EYE! AN EVIL CAT-LIKE EYE, wreathed in flames. VOICE OF SAURON There is no life here in the void...only cold...only death... FRODO is terrified! He rolls under a table, desperately pulling the ring from his finger. FRODO MATERIALIZES into the real world. AT THAT MOMENT: A LARGE HAND reaches under the table and Grabs Frodo by the collar, and DRAGS HIM AWAY! CUT TO: INT. PRANCING PONY--CORRIDOR -- NIGHT Frodo is roughly pushed against the wall.    The Brooding stranger looms over him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You draw far too much attention to yourself...Mr. Underhill
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. HOBBIT'S ROOM, PRANCING PONY -- NIGHT Frodo is pushed into the Hobbit's room by Strider.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you want?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A little more caution from you...that is no trinket you carry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I carry nothing. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Indeed? I can usually avoid being seen if I wish, but to disappear entirely... that is a rare gift.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you frightened?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not nearly frightened enough. I know what hunts you. Frodo jumps at the sound of a noise in the corridor. Strider deftly draws his sword. The door bursts open and Sam, Merry and Pippin appear on the doorway. Sam is Squaring off with is fists, Merry brandishes a candlestick, and Pippin a chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (angry) Let him go or I'll have you, Longshanks! STRIDER SHEATHS his sword, a slight smile playing on his lips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have a stout heart, little Hobbit, but that alone won't save you...You can no longer wait for the Wizard, Frodo. They're coming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. GATEHOUSE, BREE -- NIGHT The gate keeper comes out of his Lodgings with a lantern...a look of fear on his face. He approaches the closed gate with great apprehension. CLOSE ON: The Gatekeeper peers out of his Peephole. CRASH!! The gate crashed down on the gatekeeper...as four RINGWRAITHS ride into Bree! 50. EXT. BREE STREETS -- NIGHT The four RINGWRAITHS fly done the empty streets, like horsemen of the apocalypse. INT. PRANCING PONY INN -- NIGHT LOW ANGLE: the front door FLIES OPEN. The FOUR RINGWRAITHS rush into the PRANCING PONY with WICKED SWORDS DRAWN. CLOSE ON: BUTTERBUR hiding behind his bar... trembling and sweating in TERROR. INT. HOBBIT'S ROOM, PRANCING PONY -- NIGHT INSERT: MERRY SNORING SOFTLY ON HIS PILLOW. INSERT: PIPPIN stirs slightly, then settles back to sleep. WIDE ON: the door creaks open...THE FOUR RINGWRAITHS silently slide into the Hobbit's room. The LOOM above each bed, raising their SHINING SWORDS ABOVE THE SLEEPING HOBBITS. QUICK INSERT: Sam's eyes open wide. In unison, the RINGWRAITS STAB THE HOBBITS, in a Slashing, hacking frenzy. INT. STRIDER'S ROOM -- NIGHT Strider is grimly listening to the sounds from his room. INT. HOBBIT'S ROOM, PRANCING PONY -- NIGHT Wide on: the RINGWRAITHS step back from the slashed beds in triumph. CLOSE ON: a hacked blanket is pulled back to reveal nothing but a shredded pillow. The RINGWRAITHS SHRIEK WITH RAGE!! INSERTS: Sam sits up with a start! Close on: Another shredded pillow is revealed! More Shrieks of rage. INSERT: PIPPIN AND MERRY wake with a start. CUT TO: INT. STRIDER'S ROOM -- NIGHT WIDE ON: Sam, Merry, and Pippin have been sleeping on Strider's bed. Frodo stands next to Strider by the window, peering out nervously as furious Ringwraith screeches echo across the courtyard from the Hobbits room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are they?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They were once men. Strider glances quickly at Frodo, then looks away... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quietly) Great Kings of men. Then Sauron the deceiver gave to them Nine Rings of Power. Blinded by their greed they took them without question, one by one falling into darkness and now they are slaves to his will. Strider looks from the window as the Ringwraiths gallop down the Bree Streets. CLOSE ON: Strider turns back to the Hobbits, his face lit faintly by the Glowing Embers of the Fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They are the Nazgul, Ringwraiths, neither living or dead. At all times they feel the presence of the ring...drawn to the power of the one..they will never stop hunting you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. CHETWOOD FOREST -- DAY ANGLE ON: STRIDER, MERRY, PIPPIN, AND FRODO march through a gloomy, overgrown forest. Sam follows at the read leading "Bill", a scrawny pony, who is laden with supplies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you taking us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Into the wild. Frodo watches uneasily as Strider moves off into the cover of the trees...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispered aside) How do, we know this Strider is a friend of Gandalf?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have no choice but to trust him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But where is he leading us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON: (CONTINUED) 52. CONTINUED: Strider stops, casts a glance back at Sam.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To Rivendell, Master Gamgee...to the house of Elrond. SAM looks excited.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you hear that, Bill? Rivendell! We're going to see the Elves! Strider leads the Hobbits through the gloom of the forest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. MIDGEWATER MOORS -- DAY Aerial on: Strider leading Frodo, Sam, Merry, and Pippin across the windswept moors. The hobbits suddenly stop and unstrap their knapsacks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gentlemen, we do not stop until nightfall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about breakfast?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've already had it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've had one, yes...but what about Second Breakfast? Strider stares at Pippin blankly, then turns away, shaking his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think he knows about second breakfast, Pip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about Elvenses, Luncheon, Afternoon Tea, dinner...he knows about them, doesn't he?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wouldn't count on it. An apple is thrown to Merry, who deftly catches it.   Another, aimed at Pippin, catches him on the forehead. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (exasperated) Pippin! The hobbits trudge through rain, looking tired, hungry, and miserable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. ORTHANC ANTE-CHAMBER -- NIGHT Saruman stands over the Palantir, his hands cupping the massive eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whisper) The power of Isengard is at your command, Sauron, Lord of the Earth. ON THE SOUNDTRACK: BLACK SPEECH FILLS THE ROOM...ADMIST THE HARSH, GUTTURAL WORDS THE VOICE OF SARUMAN EMERGES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Build me an army worth of Mordor. INT. ORTHANC ANTE-CHAMBER -- NIGHT Saruman is seated as his ORC OVERSEER approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What orders from Mordor, my Lord. What does the eye command?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have work to do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. ISENGARD -- NIGHT CLOSE ON: GANDALF...lying unconscious on a cold obsidian floor. He wakes to the sound of ripping and tearing...rising onto his knees...lifting his head... Gandalf stands as the camera pulls back to reveal him stranded on the summit of Orthanc. He is marooned on the tiny, flat peak, surrounded on all sides by a sheer 500 FOOT DROP.
