Another whispering wail rends the air. Gandalf crosses quickly to the edge and peers down: POV: One of the beautiful Isengard trees is being ripped from the ground by the ORCS. Gandalf looks on in Horror as ORCS hack into the trunk with axes. ANGLE ON: (CONTINUED) 54. CONTINUED: SARUMAN stands in Rain looking out into the dark night...the ORC overseer sidles up to him, axe in hand, sweating with exertion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The trees are strong, my Lord.   Their roots go deep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rip them all down. CAMERA CIRCLES SUMMIT: MORE AND MORE TREES are hauled down and killed...as Gandalf looks on in helpless despair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. WEATHERHILLS -- DAY Wide on: The rugged countryside as the hobbits journey on, lead by Strider. Strider stops before a distant hill, topped by an Ancient Ruin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This was once the great Watchtower of Amon Sul. We shall rest here tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. WEATHERTOP HOLLOW -- DUSK ANGLE ON: FRODO, MERRY, AND PIPPIN collapse into a small hollow, halfway up Weathertop...they are muddy and exhausted. Stider drops 4 small swords at the Hobbits feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are for you. Keep them close. I'm going to have a look around. Stay here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. WEATHERTOP HOLLOW -- NIGHT Close on: Frodo...eyes flickering open. He suddenly sits up, sniffing the air. Sam, Merry, and Pippin huddled over a small fire... Sausages and bacon sizzle in a hot frying pan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tomatoes, sausages, and crispy bacon. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We saved some for you, Mr. Frodo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Put it out, you fools! Put it out! Frodo desperately kicks dirt on the fire!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, that's nice...ash on my tomatoes! A SUDDEN SHREIK!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON: FIVE RINGWRAITHS ON FOOT, running up the steep slope unnaturally fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go! ! Frodo, Sam, Merry and Pippin clamber desperately towards the summit, clutching their swords.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. WEATHERTOP SUMMIT -- NIGHT Frodo, Sam, Merry, and Pippin race into a RING OF BROKEN STONES on the summit or Weathertop...the ruined base of an ancient tower. The hobbits stand back-to-back in the centre of the Ring, waiting for the first assault... One by one, the 5 Ringwraiths appear...brandishing Gleaming swords, they move slowly towards the hobbits. In the center is their leader...the WITCH KING!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Back, you devils! Sam rushes forward with a cry. He swings his sword at the Witch King, who blocks the blow with his own sword. Sam's blade shatters...the WITCH KING lashes out with his fist, sending Sam flying. Merry and Pippin, overcome with terror, throw themselves flat on the ground. THE RINGWRAITHS close in on Frodo...a Venomous whisper dances in his head... Frodo shuts his eyes and staggers back, desperately resisting the WRAITH'S WHISPERINGS... slow motion as his hand goes into his pocket and pulls out the ring. direction.raw_text: It is mine to give to whom I will, like my heart. Arwen closes Strider's fingers around the jewel. Arwen leans towards Strider, gently kissing him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. COUNCIL CHAMBER, RIVENDELL -- DAY Elrond addresses the council...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Strangers from distant lands ... friends of old. You have been summoned here to answer the threat of Mordor. Middle-earth stands upon the brink of destruction. None can escape it. You will unite...or you will fall. Each race is bound to this fate...this one doom... Frodo sits amongst a council of free-peoples of Middle earth, Elrond stands before them, addressing Gandalf, Strider, Legolas, and 20 other elves, Dwarves, and men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bring forth the ring, Frodo. Frodo steps forward and moves towards a stone Plinth. He places the ring on the plinth and returns to his seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shocked) So it is true!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (disbelief) Sauron's Ring! The ring of power! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (grim) The doom of man!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is a gift...a gift to the foes of Mordor! Why not use this Ring? Long has my father, the Steward of Gondor, held the forces of Mordor at bay...by the blood of our people are your lands kept safe. Give Gondor the weapon of the enemy...let us use it against him!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You cannot wield it. None of us can. The one ring answers to Sauron alone...it has no other master. Boromir turns and looks at Strider, coolly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And what would a ranger know of this matter? Strider says nothing and Boromir turns away dismissively. LEGOLAS stands...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is no mere Ranger. He is Aragorn, son of Arathorn. You owe him your allegiance. Frodo looks at Strider questioningly...Boromir turns sharply.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quiet disbelief) Aragorn? This is Isildur's heir?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And heir to the throne of Gondor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Elvish: with subtitles) Havo dad, Legolas...Sit down, Legolas..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gondor needs no king.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aragorn is right...we cannot use it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have only one choice..the ring must be destroyed. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2) The HUM OF THE RING seems to grow louder in Frodo's ears. Gimli suddenly stands, excited.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then...what are we waiting for? Gimli suddenly rushes forward! He swings his axe down on the ring. The axe shatters with a deafening crack! Gimli falls backwards, staring in disbelief at the ring...unharmed! Frodo winces as an angry image of the fiery eye hits him! He slumps in this chair, clutching his forehead. Gandalf looks at him with concern.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ring cannot be destroyed, Gimli, son of Gloin, by any craft that we
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: here possess. The ring was made in the fires of Mount Doom...only there can it be unmade. It must be taken deep into Mordor, and cast back into the fiery chasm from whence it came. One of you must do this. Stunned silence...the council sits with downcast eyes, as if a great dread has descended on them. Boromir addresses the council in a quiet voice
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One does not simply walk into Mordor. Its black gates are guarded by more than just Orcs. There is evil there that does not sleep and the Great Eye is ever watchful. It is a barren wasteland, riddled with fire and ash and dust...the very air you breathe is a poisonous fume. Not with ten thousand men could you do this. It is folly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you heard nothing Lord Elrond has said? The ring must be destroyed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I suppose you think you're the one to do it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And if we fail, what then? What happens when Sauron takes back what is his? Gimli leaps to his feet! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will be dead before I see the Ring in the hands of an Elf! A STORM OF ARGUMENT erupts around the room. CLOSE ON:
direction.name: direction

result.heading: ELROND AND ISILDUR STAND BEFORE THE FIRES OF MT

direction.raw_text: ...sound disappears as he watches in slow motion...the angry faces, the shaking fists, the accusatory fingers, his eyes move across to the ring...the hum grows louder in his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shouting) Never trust an Elf! CLOSE ON: THE RING fills the screen...streams of blood flow across the surface... flames flicker within the Gold Band.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you not understand? While we    bicker among ourselves, Sauron's power   grows! No one will escape it. You will   all be destroyed, your homes burnt and   your families put to the sword! CLOSE ON: FRODO...breathing rapidly, Caught in the grip of his hideous vision. With a huge effort or will, Frodo tears his gaze upon the ring. Frodo suddenly stands...he speaks in a strong, clear voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will take it...I will take it...I will take the Ring to Mordor. Sudden silence...Frodo looks around the room at the astounded faces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quietly) Though...I do not know the way. Gandalf rises to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will help you bear this burden, Frodo Baggins, as long as it is yours to bear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If, by my life or death, I can protect you, I will. (kneels before Frodo) ...you have my sword. Aragorn steps forward...followed by Legolas and Gimli. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (4)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you have my bow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And my axe. Boromir looks at them all then walks towards Frodo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You carry the fate of us all, little one. Boromir looks towards Elrond and Gandalf.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If this is indeed the will of the Council, then Gondor will see it done. Frodo stares in wonder as the Greatest Fighters in all Middle earth stand at his side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (unseen) Here! A Sudden Noise...Sam pops up from behind a Bush!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Frodo's not gong anywhere without me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, Indeed...it is hardly possible to separate you...even when he is summoned to a secret council and you are not. Merry and Pippin jump up from behind another bush!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oi! We're coming too! You'll have to send us home tied up in a sack to stop us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anyway...you need people of intelligence on this sort of mission...quest...thing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, that rules you out, Pip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ELROND SURVEYS THE GROUP ELROND (thoughtfully) Nine companions ... so be it. (announcing) You shall be the "Fellowship of the ring"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great.   Where are we going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. FRODO'S BEDROOM, RIVERDELL---DAWN Close on: An old sword sliding out of a shabby leather Scabbard...its polished, well tendered Blade glitters cold and bright.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My old sword "Sting"...here, take it! Bilbo offers Sting to Frodo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's so light!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, yes, made by the Elves, you know. The blade glows blue when Orcs are close...and it's times like that, my lad, when you have to be extra careful. Bilbo unwraps a small shirt of close woven Mail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here's a pretty thing. Mithril, as light as a feather, and as hard as dragon scales. Let me see you put it on. Come on. CLOSE ON: Frodo peels off his shirt... revealing The Ring on the Chain around his neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (entranced) Oh! My old Ring... Frodo frowns as Bilbo moves toward him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I should very much like to hold it again, one last time. Bilbo reaches forward, eyes locked on the ring. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: Suddenly! A shadow passes across Bilbo...for a split second he becomes a wrinkled creature with a hungry face and Bony, groping hands. Frodo pulls away, shocked...the shadow passes. Bilbo slumps into a chair, his head in his hands. Bilbo falters...his eyes filling with tears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sad) I'm sorry, that I brought this upon you, my boy...I'm sorry that you must carry this burden. I'm sorry for everything. Bilbo sobs and Frodo moves to comfort him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. RIVENDELL VALLEY -- MORNING ANGLE ON: The Fellowship climb the long steep path out of the cloven vale of Rivendell. CUT TO: EXT. ROUGH COUNTRY, SOUTH OF RIVENDELL -- DAY ANGLE ON: The fellowship trekking through a land of Deep Valleys and turbulent waters...the misty mountains rise sharply to their left.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We must hold to his course west of the misty Mountains for forty days. If our luck holds, the Gap of Rohan will still be open to us. From there, our road turns east, to Mordor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. EREGION HILLS--DAWN CLOSE ON: Sam at the campfire. The sound of clashing swords! Wider: Aragorn and Boromir are giving Pippin Sword tuition... (CONTINUED) 80. CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get away from the blade, Pippin...on your toes...good, very good...I want you to react, not think.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Should not be too hard...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Move your feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quite good, Pippin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks. CLOSE ON: GIMLI has managed to corner Gandalf....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If anyone were to ask for my opinion, which I note they have not, I would say we are taking the long way round. Gandalf, we can pass through the Mines of Moria. My cousin, Balin, would give us a royal welcome. Gandalf clearly thinks that is a bad idea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, Gimli. I would not take the road through Moria unless I had no other choice. Boromir thrusts, catching Pippin on the hand. Pippin throws down his sword, kicks and lunges at Boromir, tackling him to the ground. Much laughter. Legolas' eyes are fixed on a distant Dark Patch which darts about the sky, like flying smoke in the wind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing...it's just a wisp of a cloud.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (worried) It's moving fast...against the wind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Crebain from Dunland! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (urgently) Hide!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Merry..Pippin...Sam...take cover! WIDE ON: THE FELLOWSHIP scramble under what little cover there is...as a regiment of Large crows fly low overhead at Great speed, wheeling and circling above. As their dark shadow passes over the fellowship, a single harsh croak is heard...and the crows suddenly wheel away, back towards the south. Gandalf staggers to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (worried) Spies of Saruman.    The passage South is being watched. Gandalf looks at Aragorn, turns to the others...gesturing towards a high mountain pass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We must take the pass of Caradhras!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. SNOWY MOUNTAINSIDE -- DAY ANGLE ON: The Fellowship clamber through Rock and Snow. CLOSE ON: Frodo slips on some shale...as he scrambles to his feet, the Ring falls on the ground... CLOSE ON: the ring gleaming in the snow! Boromir's Hand picks it up by the chain...he stands, the ring dangling before his eyes. He seems to grow in stature, as if absorbing its power. Aragorn warily approaches Boromir...Boromir is motionless...he stares at the ring, as if transfixed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boromir?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is a strange fate that we should suffer so much fear and doubt over so small a thing...such a little thing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quietly) Boromir...give the ring to Frodo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: moves to his sword hilt. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: Ring's POV...looking up at Boromir's face. The strange hum vibrates on the soundtrack. CLOSE ON: a Weird beatific smile lights up Boromir's face...The HUM grows to a Deafening roar! Boromir suddenly snaps out of his trance and hands the ring back to Frodo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (lightly) As you wish. I care not. Boromir smiles at Frodo, ruffling his hair. CLOSE ON: ARAGON unhands his sword.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. ISENGARD -- DAY Following the crows as they race deeper and deeper, passing a vista of Industry, Hundreds of Orcs and writhing Birthsacks...flying past Saruman, who stands upon a wooden Gantry. CLOSE ON: Saruman, listening to the Cries of the crows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, Gandalf...you try to lead them over Caradhras. And if that fails...where then will you go? THE FELLOWSHIP struggles through the snow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If the mountain defeats you, will you risk a more dangerous road?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. PASS OF CARADHRAS -- DAY THE FELLOWSHIP are struggling through a blinding blizzard, up towards the PASS OF CARADHRAS. Legolas the Elf moves lightly across the top of the snow...he suddenly pauses. Saruman's voice sweeps by in the wind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (urgent) There is a fell voice in the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Saruman. THUNDER RUMBLES...ROCK and Shale fall from above. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (urgently) He's trying to bring down the mountain. Gandalf! We must turn back!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! GANDALF RAISES HIS STAFF...HE CHANTS INTO THE WIND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Losto Caradhras, sedho, hodo, nuitho I ruith. Sleep Caradhras, be still, lie still, hold your wrath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. ISENGARD -- DAY CAMERA SWEEPS PAST SARUMAN...he stands on the summit of Orthanc, Chanting. CLOUDS ARE FLOWING FROM ALL DIRECTIONS... converging on the distant mountains in a stormy Malestrom. EXT. PASS OF CARADHRAS -- DAY Saruman's voice strengthens...rolling past the fellowship like thunder. A LIGHTNING CRACK explodes on the mountainside above them. Frodo looks up in horror as a huge snow avalanche thunders down towards them! The Fellowship throw themselves against the cliff face as snow crashes onto the narrow ledge. LEGOLAS pulls Gandalf to safety. Aragorn shields Frodo and Sam as snow piles around them. Within moments, the pass is blocked and the fellowship are enveloped in snow. Boromir and Aragorn frantically dig for the hobbits...who are pulled out Shivering and Fearful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (urgent) We must get off the mountain! Make for the gap of Rohan and take the West road to my city.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Gap of Rohan takes us too close to Isengard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We cannot pass over the mountain. Let us go under it. Let us go through the mines of Moria. Gandalf has a concerned look on his face. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Moria. You fear to go into those mines, don't you? The dwarves delved too greedily and too deep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know what they awoke in, the darkness of Khazad-dum. Shadow and flame.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let the ringbearer decide. CLOSE ON: FRODO, the weight of the decision weighing heavily upon him. CLOSE ON: MERRY and PIPPIN shivering in Boromir's arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Frodo? Frodo meets Gandalf's eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We will go through the mines. Gandalf slowly nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So be it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. MORIA GATE -- NIGHT The Fellowship are walking along the far shore of dark lake...directly below great looming cliffs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in awe) The walls of Moria! Footing is treacherous on the narrow strip of green and greasy stones. Gandalf touches the smooth rock wall between the trees... slowly, faint lines appear like slender veins of luminous silver running through the stone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Itidin...it mirrors only starlight and moonlight. A large moon rises over the mountains... The lines grow Broader and Clearer, forming a glowing arch of interlacing ancient letters and symbols. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It reads, "The door of Durin, Lord of Moria. Speak, friend, and enter."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you suppose that means?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (confident) It's quite simple. If you are a friend, speak the password and the doors will open. Gandalf raises his arms...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (incanting) Annon edhellen, edro hi ammen! The cliff towers into the night, the wind blows cold, Frodo shivers... and the door stands fast!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : GANDALF CONTINUES... Mumbling spells in his efforts to open the door. Sam packs pots and pans at his feet...watching sadly as Aragorn un- saddles Bill the pony. CLOSE ON: ARAGORN whispering to Bill the Pony.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispering) Mines are no place for a Pony, even one so brave as Bill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bye, Bill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go on, Bill, go on..don't worry, Sam...he knows his way home. Aragorn slaps Bill on the rump...Bill goes trotting off. CLOSE ON: Sam watching Bill disappear into the darkness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goodbye, Bill. SPLASH! Merry and Pippin are tossing stones into the lake. Black Rippling rings slowly fan out. Pippin is about to throw another stone, but Aragorn grabs his arm. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (ominous) Do not disturb the water. Aragorn watches anxiously as the Ripples appear to grow....he exchanges a look with Boromir. Aragorn's hand creeps towards his sword. Gandalf gives up in despair...he sits down beside Frodo. Close on: Frodo peers at the Elvish inscription...his face breaks into a smile of comprehension.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quietly) It's a riddle... Gandalf raises his eyebrows...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (explaining) Speak, friend, and enter.   What's the Elvish for friend?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh...mellon. With that, the rock face silently divides in the middle and two great Doors swing outwards... revealing a blackness deeper than the night. As the Fellowship enter the Blackness, something in the water stirs.... INT. MORIA GATE -- NIGHT The Fellowship step warily into the darkness of Moria...a Dank cavern, with winding steps leading deeper into the mountain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, master elf, you will enjoy the fabled hospitality of the dwarves; roaring fires, malt beer, red meat off the bone. This, my friend, is the home of my cousin, Balin...and they call this a Mine... (snorting) A mine! A Glow from Gandalf's Staff suddenly lights    the chamber... The Fellowship recoil in Horror! Many dwarf    Skeletons are strewn about, clearly the dead of some old    battle...the rusting armor and shields are peppered with    arrows and axes. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (grimly) This is no mine...it's a tomb!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in horror) Oh...no...no..no... ! Legolas pulls a crude arrow out of a skeleton.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goblins! The Fellowship draw swords and back away, towards the Entrance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We make for the Gap of Rohan.    We should never have come here. EXT. MORIA GATE -- NIGHT Frodo is suddenly PULLED TO THE GROUND. A long sinuous Tentacle is wrapped around Frodo's ankle and is dragging him towards the lake. FRODO CRIES OUT as Aragorn and Boromir rush forward! Aragorn severs the Tentacle holding Frodo, and pulls him to safety...Boromir hacks at the other Writhing Limbs. 20 more tentacles ripple out of the Lake! The dark water Boils as the hideous beast lashes out at the FELLOWSHIP! Again the creature grabs Frodo and pulls him to the lake, Frodo is flung in the air as the Fellowship battle the creature. Aragorn hacks at a tentacle...Frodo is released, falling into Boromir's arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Into the mines!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Legolas! Legolas shoots an Arrow into the creature's head, gaining a few vital seconds for Aragorn and Boromir as they race out of the water with Frodo. The FELLOWSHIP hurriedly back away from the Creature... retreating into the Moria Chamber as many Coiling arms seize the large doors. INT. MORIA GATE -- NIGHT With a shattering echo, the creature rips the doors away, creating a rock slide that crashes down the Cliff Face. Within seconds, tons of rock seal the doorway... throwing the Fellowship into Pitch Blackness. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: A faint light rises from Gandalf's staff, throwing a Creepy Glow across the old wizards face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (ominous) We now have but one choice...we must face the long dark of Moria. Be on your guard...there are older and fouler things than the Orcs in the deep places of the world.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. NEW CHAMBER, MORIA -- NIGHT WIDE ON: the Fellowship crossing a precarious bridge above deep mine workings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quietly, now. It's a four day journey to the other side. Let us hope that our presence will go unnoticed. INT. MORIA CEMETERY CAVERN -- NIGHT They continue up a steep stair, passing through a dwarf cemetery. The graves are despoiled...dwarf skeletons are strewn about and Goblin Graffiti is scrawled on monuments in dried Dwarf blood. The Atmosphere is very sinister.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. MORIA TUNNEL FORK -- NIGHT The path splits into three passages...each disappearing into dark tunnels. Gandalf pauses, frowning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have no memory of this place. LATER... The Fellowship are nervously waiting...while Gandalf sits, staring intently at the 3 tunnel mouths in front of him. He appears to be in some kind of trance. CLOSE ON: FRODO He turns at the sound of a faint noise down the tunnel behind them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are we lost? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I don't think we are.   Shhhh, Gandalf's thinking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Merry!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm hungry. Frodo's POV: a sudden glimpse of a creature darting in the darkness. Frodo is nervous...he approaches Gandalf.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispers) There's something down there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quietly) It's Gollum.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gollum!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's been following us for three days. TEASING SHOT: and emaciated, leering creature.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (disbelieving) He escaped the dungeons of Barad- dur?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Escaped...or was set loose. And now the Ring has drawn him here...he will never be rid of his need for it. He hates and loves the ring, as he hates and loves himself. Smeagol's life is a sad story. Gandalf catches Frodo's look of surprise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes...Smeagol he was once called...Before the ring came to him, before it drove him mad. Gollum's withered fingers are gripping the cave wall...he is large, Luminous eyes blinking with malice. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (grim) It's a pity Bilbo didn't kill him when he had the chance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pity? It was pity that stayed Bilbo's hand. Many that live deserve death, and some that die deserve life. Can you give it to them, Frodo? Frodo frowns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do not be too eager to deal out death in judgment...even the very wise cannot see all ends. My heart tells me that Gollum has some part to play yet, for good or ill, before this is over. The pity of Bilbo may rule the fate of many.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wish the ring had never come to me...I wish none of this had happened.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So do all who live to see such times, but that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us. There is a note of finality in Gandalf's voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are other forces at work in this world, Frodo, besides the will of evil. Bilbo was meant to find the ring. In which case, you also were meant to have it...and that is an encouraging thought, (sudden brightness) Ah! That it's that way! Gandalf points at the right hand tunnel...the Fellowship scramble to their feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (relieved) He's remembered!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, but the air doesn't smell so foul down there. If in doubt, Meriadoc, always follow your nose! (laughs) Ye s...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. DWAROWDELF CHAMBER, MORIA -- DAY The Fellowship pass under an arched doorway into a black and empty space. Gandalf pauses...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me risk a little more light. Gandalf taps his staff...for a brief moment a light blazes... like a silent Flash of Lightning.    Great shadows spring up and flee...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Behold! The great realm and Dwarf city of Dwarrowdelf! Frodo gasps at the brief sight of a vast roof, far above their heads, upheld by many mighty pillars hewn of stone. Before them stretches a huge empty hall, with black walls, polished and smooth as glass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, there's an eye opener and no mistake! Ahead of them, a wooden door has been smashed. Black arrows are embedded in the timbers. Two goblin skeletons lie in the doorway. Gimli rushes ahead...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gimli!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BALIN'S TOMB, MORIA -- DAY Gimli rushes into another vast empty chamber... lit with a narrow shaft of sunlight, beaming in from a small hole near the roof. Dwarf and Goblin skeletons are piled high. In the far corner sits a stone walled Well. A shaft of light falls directly onto a stone table in the middle of the room: a single oblong block, about 4 feet high, topped with a great slab of white stone. Gimli falls to his knees...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No...no...oh, no! Gimli sobs. Gandalf quietly reads an inscription of runes, carved onto the white stone slab. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Here lies Balin, son of Fudin, Lord of Moria." He is dead, then. It's as I had feared. Gandalf carefully lifts the rotting remains of a book from the white stone slab. It has been slashed and stabbed...and appears to be covered in Dried Blood. The pages crack and break as he opens it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (urgent whisper to Argorn) We must move on, we cannot linger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (reading) "They have taken the Bridge and the second hall: we have barred the gates...but cannot hold them for long...the ground shakes...drums in the deep...we cannot get out. A shadow moves in the dark. Will no- one save us? They are coming." Unnerved, Pippin backs away nervously...He stumbles against the well, sending a precariously balanced Armored skeleton tumbling in! Merry reaches out, Grabbing hold of Pippin before he falls. The Fellowship freeze in stunned silence as the armored skeleton clatters down the deep well...echoing loudly! INT. MORIA CAVERNS -- DAY Gandalf turns angrily on Pippin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (angry) Fool of a Took! Throw yourself in next time and rid us of your stupidity! ANGLE ON:    PIPPIN, CHASTENED. They fall silent. A low rolling boom rises from the depths below...growing louder...BOOM...BOOM...as if the caverns of Moria were turned into a vast drum. A great horn blasts nearby...Answering horns ... running feet...harsh cries... Sam's eyes glance at Frodo's belt...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (worried) Mr. Frodo! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: Frodo looks down. A cold blue glow is emanating from Sting's Scabbard! Frodo draws the Sword...and stares at its glowing blade!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Orcs !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the hobbits) Get back! Stay close to Gandalf. Aragorn and Boromir slam and wedge the doors. Boromir catches sight of something; he turns to Aragorn with shock in his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They have a cave troll! Gimli snatches up two rusty dwarf axes and leaps onto the tomb.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (yelling) Let them come! There is one Dwarf yet in Moria who still draws breath! BOOM! The Door bursts open in a shower of wood fragments, and 20 Goblins charge into the tomb, followed by a huge cave troll! Gimli ducks a blow and immediately buries his Axes in 2 Goblin helmets. Aragorn and Boromir wade into the mass of Goblins with their swords. Legolas fires deadly arrows into Goblin throats, desperately trying to Shield the Hobbits! Gandalf is clutching his sword and joins in the battle! The cave troll is sweeping his club at Aragorn...who stumbles backwards...the huge club descends for the killing blow...suddenly, in a flash of steel, Boromir's long sword slices into the Scaly arm of the troll; it rears back, spewing green blood! Sam is backing up against a wall...a sword in one hand, a saucepan in the other. In desperation he swings wildly at a Goblin with a saucepan! It keels over...Sam looks surprised. He wallops another Goblin and it too, drops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think I'm getting the hang of this. The Cave Troll lunges forward, thrusting at Frodo's chest with his spear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aragorn!   Aragorn! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2) Sam screams as Frodo is lifted off his feet by the spear tip and slammed against the wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shocked yell) Frodo!! The hobbits go crazy. Sam slashes at the cave troll's knee, bringing him down...Merry and Pippin jump on him...Legolas fires an arrow...and the cave troll topples, dead. Aragorn rushes to Frodo's side as he slumps to the floor...Frodo appears to be dead. Close on: Gandalf, Aragorn, Hobbits looking horrified... Suddenly Frodo coughs...takes a huge breath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's alive!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm alright. I'm not hurt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should be dead. That spear would've skewered a wild boar!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think there's more to this hobbit than meets the eye. Frodo open his shirt to reveal the Mithril Vest.   The Troll Spear did not pierce the mithril."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mithril! You are full of surprises, Master Baggins. BOOM. BOOM. BOOM     the sound of the drums rings out again! Gandalf turns to the others.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To the bridge of Khazad-dum!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. DWAROWDELF CHAMBER, MORIA -- DAY Gandalf leads the fellowship into the huge Dwarrowdelf Chamber.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This way! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: They hurry towards a distant door...as Goblins start scuttling down the Pillars behind them, like cockroaches! Frodo looks with horror at the overwhelming Goblin army that's rushing toward them! SUDDENLY! A deafening roar fills the air! A fiery light dances down the hallway... the pillars casting eerie shadows. The Goblins freeze. They back Fearfully away from the approaching beast...melting into the darkness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is this new devilry? A HUGE SHADOW, surrounded by flame, falls across the hall..the ground shakes...an unearthly sound rumbles...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quietly) A Balrog..a demon of the ancient world! This foe is beyond any of you! (urgent yell) Run! Quickly!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. STAIRWAY OF KHASAD-DUM, MORIA -- DAY The BALROG, a massive creature rises from a chasm, a great 40 foot man-beast, with a mane of flames! In one hand is a blade...like a stabbing tongue of fire; in the other, a WHIP of many thongs. Aragorn leads the fellowship to the top of a dizzying stairway...Gandalf follows, leaning heavily on his staff. Close on: Aragorn looks at Gandalf, concerned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lead them on, Aragorn.   The bridge is near. Aragorn hesitates...Gandalf looks at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do as I say; swords are no more use here. THE FELLOWSHIP race down the stairway, Aragorn picks up Frodo..leaping across a gaping chasm. A NARROW BRIDGE, spanning a bottomless pit...Gandalf yells to the others: Aragorn makes to throw Gimli across the Chasm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nobody tosses a dwarf! The BALROG smashes through the wall and spreads its vast wings. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It swoops down past the Fellowship, disappearing into a flaming pit!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. BRIDGE OF KHAZAD-DUM, MORIA -- DAY The Fellowship run into a hall...the floor is split with fissures that spit flame.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (yelling) Over the bridge! Fly! They race towards the slender bridge of stone...without kerb or rail...at the far end of the hall. The Fellowship recklessly hurry over the dizzying bridge..but Gandalf... the last..pauses in the middle of the span...he faces the Balrog...staff in one hand...Sword in the other! Frodo looks back in horror:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You cannot pass!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (alarmed yell) Gandalf!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (yelling) I am a servant of the Secret Fire, wielder of the flame of Anor. The dark fire will not avail you, flame of Udun. Frodo watches as the Balrog puts one foot on the bridge and draws up to Full Height, wings spreading from wall-to-wall. Gandalf is a tiny figure, balanced precariously on the narrow bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go back to the shadow! The BALROG slashes at Gandalf with its Sword of flame...Gandalf blocks with his sword...a ringing clash and the Balrog's sword shatters into molten fragments!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (booming) You shall not pass!! The Balrog places one foot onto the bridge. Aragorn and Boromir race forward, swords drawn. GANDALF CRIES ALOUD as he summons up his LAST RESERVES OF STRENGTH! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: He thumps the bridge with his staff...a blinding sheet of white flame springs up... the staff shatters...the bridge breaks... right at Balrog's feet. The stone bridge drops away into the gulf...from under the Balrog. For a moment, the great Beast remains poised in the air...then it plunges down: in slow motion Relief floods Frodo's face..Gandalf remains trembling on the lip of the broken bridge. Slow motion: As the Balrog falls, he lashes out with his whip of fire... Slow motion: The thongs of the whip lash and curl around Gandalf's knees, dragging him over the brink! Gandalf just manages to hand on by his fingertips
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (screaming) Gandalf!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (fierce) Fly, you fools! CLOSE ON: Gandalf lets go his grip and falls away... following the Balrog into the bottomless Abyss! Frodo cries out! Boromir scoops him up and carries him away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gandalf! They rush towards an archway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. DIMROLL DALE DOOR -- DAY The Fellowship tumble out of the Great Eastern Gate on to a grassy sunlit hillside. Sam, Merry, and Pippin fall slowly to the ground, Sobbing...Aragorn turns to Legolas and Gimli.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (urgent) Legolas, get them up!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give them a moment...for pity's sake!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: By nightfall these hills will be swarming with Orcs! We must reach the woods of Lothlorien. Come, Boromir, Legolas, Gimli, get them up. On your feet, Sam. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boromir glances towards Frodo, then back at Aragorn. Frodo is walking away, as if in a daze.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Frodo?   Frodo! CLOSE ON: FRODO SLOWLY TURNS...a look of numb shock on his devastated face. The Fellowship marches on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. DIMRILL DALE HILLSIDE--DUSK Aragorn scours ahead of the company, as they stumble on in the fading light...in the distance the shimmer of a large forest can be seen...Lothlorien! EXT. EDGE OF LOTHLORIEN--DUSK WIDE ON: The fellowship run across a forest floor strewn with yellow flowers..above is a roof of golden leaves, held up by silver pillars...the trunks of huge, grey trees. Gimli looks nervously around...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay close, young hobbits..they say a Sorceress lives in these woods. An elf- witch of terrible power. All who look upon her fall under her spell... Frodo hesitates...a STRANGE VOICE whispers in his head...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Frodo...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And are never seen again!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...your coming to us is as the footsteps of doom. You bring great evil here, Ringbearer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Frodo?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, here's one dwarf she won't ensnare so easily. I have the eyes of a hawk and the ears of a fox! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: The FELLOWSHIP are suddenly surrounded by ARMED ELVES. Deadly arrows aimed at their heads. HALDIR, the Elvish captain steps forward... he looks at Gimli with disdain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The dwarf breathes so loud we could have shot him in the dark.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Elvish: with subtitles) Haldir of Lorien, we come here for your help. We need your protection.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aragorn! These woods are perilous. We should go back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have entered the realm of the Lady of the Wood. You cannot go back. Haldir's eyes lock onto Frodo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come, she is waiting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. LOTHLORIEN HILLTOP -- DAY Haldir leads the Fellowship onto a Hill Top.   They look with wonderment at the vista spread before them. Several miles towards the South, a Large Hill rises out of the woods. Upon the hill rise many mighty Mallorn Trees, taller than any others...Nestled high in the crown of the mallorns is a Beautiful City. It Gleams in the low rays of the late afternoon sun..green, gold, and silver. To the east of Caras Galadhon, the Woods of Lorien run down the pale gleam of Anduin, the great river. Beyond the River, the land appears flat and empty, formless and vague, until far away, it rises again like a dark and dreary wall. The Sun that lies on Lothlorien has not power to enlighten the shadows that lie beyond. CUT TO: INT. CELEBORN'S CHAMBER, CARAS GALADHON -- NIGHT 100. ANGLE ON: THE FELLOWSHIP step onto a wide fleet filled with a soft light. The walls are green and silver, the roof gold and in its midst is the trunk of the might Mallorn tree, now tapering toward its crown. Celeborn steps forward to greet the guests. His hair is long and silver, his face grave and beautiful, with no sign of age upon it. Next to him stands Galadriel, the Lady of the Elves. She has hair of deep gold and timeless, unsurpassed beauty. Celeborn looks hard at Aragorn...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eight there are, yet nine there were set out from Rivendell. Tell me, where is Gandalf, for I much desire to speak with him. Frodo looks at Galadriel, standing silently beside Celeborn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (softly aloud) ...he has fallen into shadow. Galadriel looks to Aragorn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Quest stands upon the edge of a knife. Stray but a little and it will fail, to the ruin of all...Yet hope remains while the company is true. Galadriel's eyes settle on Sam.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do not let your hearts be troubled. Go now and rest for you are weary with sorrow and much toil. Galadriel's eyes turn to Frodo...her voice fades.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tonight you will sleep in peace. (whispered v/o) Welcome, Frodo of the Shire... CLOSE ON:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looks at GALADRIEL. SUDDEN INSERT:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as she is on the other side... Powerful, divine...no longer of this world..a Piercing white light surrounds her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...one who has seen the eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 101. EXT. CARAS GALADHON LAWN -- NIGHT Gimli, Legolas, Merry, Pippin, Frodo and Sam are in a pavilion set among the trees near the fountain. They lie on soft couches as Elves leave food and wine for them. MOURNFUL SINGING drifts down from the trees above.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sadly) A lament for Gandalf...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do they say about him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have not the heart to tell you. For me, the grief is still too near. Boromir is sitting alone...Aragorn approaches him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take some rest..these borders are well protected. Moonlight catches the trace of tears on Boromir's face. Aragorn kneels down beside him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will find no rest here. I heard her voice inside my head...she spoke of my father and the fall of Gondor, and she said to me: "Even now, there
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is hope left. But I cannot see it...it is long since we had any hope. CLOSE ON: BOROMIR looks at ARAGORN in despair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My father is a noble man, but his rule is failing and our..our people lose faith. He looks to me to make things right...and I would do it, I would see the glory of Gondor restored. Have you ever seen it, Aragorn? The White Tower of Ecthelion, glimmering like a spike of pearl and silver, its banners caught high in the morning breeze...have you ever been called home by the clear ringing of silver trumpets?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have seen the white city..long ago. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: Boromir feels Aragorn's love for Minas Tirith and takes heart,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One day our paths will lead us there, and the tower guards shall take up the call "the Lords of Gondor have returned." Aragorn returns Boromir's smile...betraying his disquiet sadness only when Boromir looks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : LATER.... The Fellowship are asleep on their beds. Gimli is snoring loudly. CLOSE ON: BARE FEET tread soundlessly across the lawn. CLOSE ON: Frodo's eyes flicker open...as if by instinct. GALADRIEL, her White dress glowing in the moonlight, glances at him. Frodo follows her...as if drawn by an invisible force. CUT TO: EXT. GALADRIELS GLADE, LORTHLORIEN -- NIGHT Upon a low stone pedestal, carved like a branching tree, sits a shallow Silver Basin. Galadriel leads Frodo into the small Glade.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will you look into the mirror? Frodo looks with apprehension at the silver basin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (warily) What will I see? Galadriel pours water into the basin from a silver jug...a glow rises from the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Even the wisest cannot tell for the mirror shows many things...things that were ..things that are...and some things that have not yet come to pass. Frodo slowly steps up to the pedestal...he peers     into the glossy surface. The night sky is reflected into     the water... suddenly a figure takes form...the bowed figure     of an old man, clad in white robes. He walks down a long      road. Frodo leans closer to the mirror's surface...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CLOSE ON: GANDALF LIFTS HIS HEAD AND LOOKS DIRECTLY AT FRODO! FRODO gasps, his face lighting up with hope.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (joyous) Gandalf! Gandalf looks at Frodo with a fierce intensity. Frodo reaches out his hand toward the surface of the mirror. Suddenly the image flares, burning out to white. The vision shifts...Frodo gasps in horror! The Shire is in ruins! The image suddenly widens to fill the screen...buildings burning...bodies strewn about...Dark Shapes of ORCS looting and destroying...Bag End, billowing in flames! The Party tree is hacked down. Frodo reels back as the mirror seems to grow...the nightmarish image sweeps past his head, engulfing him entirely. IMAGE: Hobbiton...now an Industrial wasteland! The fields and trees destroyed...replaced with Brick factories belching smoke! IMAGE: ORCS brutally herd manacled Hobbits into the Factories! We see Sam...Merry... and Rosie Cotton. Soot- stained and sobbing, they disappear into the factory hell- hole! Suddenly, the mirror goes dark...and out of the black abyss a single eye grows. CLOSE ON: FRODO IS FROZEN. Unable to move or cry out. The ring dangles from his neck, inches above the water...not shimmering with curls of steam. Fire erupts around the eye... With a Yell, Frodo pushes himself away from the pedestal and collapses on the ground. Light instantly fades from the mirror. Frodo comes to his senses...he is shocked. Galadriel stands still as a statue, unmoved, untouched by the horror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know what it is you saw...for it is also in my mind. It is the future, Frodo. It is what will come to pass if you should fail. Galadriel looks at Frodo intensely...Frodo looks down...in his hand he is clutching the ring. Frodo looks up at Galadriel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The fellowship is breaking. It has already begun. He will try to take the ring. You know of whom I speak. One by one, it will destroy them all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you ask it of me, I will give you the One Ring. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You offer it to me freely...I do not deny that my heart has greatly desired this. Galadriel suddenly seems to rise in stature before Frodo's eyes. Frodo is suddenly afraid of her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In place of the Dark Lord, you would have a Queen, not dark, but beautiful and terrible as the Dawn. Treacherous as the Sea! Stronger than the foundations of the earth...all shall love me and despair! Frodo takes a step away from Galadriel... Galadriel suddenly laughs...a slender Elf-woman once more, clad in simple white, her voice soft and sad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (gently) I pass the test. (laughs) I will diminish and go into the west and remain Galadriel. Frodo's confidence drains away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I cannot do this alone...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are the ring-bearer, Frodo...to bear a ring of power is to be alone. This task was appointed to you, and if you do not find a way, no one will. Frodo realizes what her message is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then I know what I must do. It's just...I'm afraid to do it. Galadriel kneels down to Frodo's height, staring at him intently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future. The Ring lies in the palm of Frodo's hand...his fingers close over it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 105. INT. ORTHANC CHAMBER -- DAY Naked, Lurtz's eyes follow Saruman, alight with a mean intelligence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (smiles) They were Elves once. Taken by the Dark Powers ... tortured and mutilated...a ruined and terrible form of life. And now...perfected. My fighting Uruk-Hai. Whom do you serve?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (gutteral rasp) Saruman. INT. CAVERNS BELOW ISENGARD -- DAY QUICK CUTS: LURTZ is quickly armored...Breastplate...Leg guards, Helmet...a sword is thrust in Lurtz's hand. The URUK- HAI are smearing themselves in white paint...a creepy ritualistic ceremony...the white hand of Isengard is smeared on bodies, faces, and armor. SARUMAN address a crowd of 200 fully armed URUK-HAI.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hunt them down. Do not stop until they are found. You do not know pain. You do not know fear. You will taste man-flesh. Saruman turns to Lurtz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (coldly) One of the Halflings carries something of great value...bring him to me...alive and unspoiled...kill the others. EXT. ISENGARD -- DAY Lurtz is leading 200 URUK-HAI out of Isengard..they run fast, their powerful legs carrying them at speed. EXT. SILVERLODE RIVER BANK--DAWN The Fellowship are in small elven boats. They row away from the Lothlorien Shore into the Silverlode river. Elves quietly watch them depart. Galadriel gives Frodo a small Crystal Phial.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Farewell, Frodo Baggins. I give you the light of Earendil, our most beloved star. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: As the Fellowship's boats drift past, Galadriel stands alone, watching from the banks of the river. In his head, Frodo still hears her voice...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: May it be a light for you in dark places, when all other lights go out. EXT. RIVER ANDUIN -- DAY The boats pass into the great river Anduin. The Three Elven boats carry the Fellowship steadily southward. Green trees slowly give way to a brown and withered land. EXT. FOREST -- DAY The Uruk forces are running through the trees with deadly purpose. EXT. RIVER ANDUIN -- DAY A flock of birds circle high above, Black against the pale sky. Aragorn watches them with concern. EXT. PILLARS OF THE KINGS, RIVER ANDUIN--DAWN The Three Elven boats drift slowly through the steep rocky gorge in the Pre-dawn light. CLOSE ON: ARAGORN, slowly paddling in the stern.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quietly) Frodo. Frodo slowly looks up, his eyes widening with amazement. Wide on: Two enormous rock statues, towering like 300 foot pinnacles on either side of the river...carved images of Gondorian kings of old. They loom over the boats with power and majesty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Argonath... Close on: Aragorn...strangely moved by the beauty of the silent sentinels. He speaks, almost as if to himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (deeply moved) Long have I desired to look upon the kings of old...my kin. The fellowship stare in stunned silence as the current takes them through the narrow gap between the Statues' feet. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: Wide on: Craning up past the statues vast crumbling heads, to reveal a large lake only a mile down river... EXT. SHORE OF NEN HITHOEL -- DAY ANGLE ON: THE FELLOWSHIP As they leap out of the boats and clamber onto the wooded shore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We cross the lake at nightfall, hide the boats and continue on foot..we approach Mordor from the North.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (gloomy) Oh, yes, just a simple matter of finding our way through Emyn Muil, an impassable labyrinth of razor sharp rocks. And after that gets even better...a festering, stinking marshland, far as the eye can see.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That is our Road...I suggest you take some rest and recover your strength, Master Dwarf.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (indignant) Recover my... Legolas turns to Aragorn with urgency.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We should leave now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Orcs patrol the Eastern shore. We must wait for cover of darkness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is not the Eastern shore that worries me. Legolas casts a glance around into the Parth Galen forest...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A shadow and a threat has been growing in my mind. Something draws near, I can feel it. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: Aragorn looks at Legolas, knowing full well what he means. Sam has slumped asleep...Merry dumps a small pile of kindling at Gimli's feet...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's Frodo? Sam sits up with a start...Aragorn's head snaps round..his eyes fly to Boromir's shield which lies abandoned by his camp bed. CLOSE ON: ARAGORN.... as he realizes Boromir has gone! EXT. SLOPES OF AMON HEN -- DAY Frodo is walking beneath the trees...lost in thought. His feet hit the rough edge of an ancient stone slab...his eyes follow an overgrown path towards stone stairs leading to the summit of Amon Hen...the seeing seat. A CRACKLING SOUND! Frodo freezes....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quietly) None of us should wander alone; you least of all. So much depends on you...Frodo? Frodo turns slowly...he stares at Boromir, tense, cautious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know why you seek solitude. You suffer, I see it day by day. Are you sure you do not suffer needlessly? Frodo stands silent for a moment..the murmur of the Wind in the trees and the distant roar of the falls of Rauros can be heard
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me help you. There are other ways, Frodo..other paths that we might take.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know what you would say, and it would seem like wisdom but for the warning of my heart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Warning?   Against what? Boromir has started forward towards Frodo, he pulls himself up. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are all afraid, Frodo. But to let that fear drive us to destroy what hope we have...don't you see that is madness?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is no other way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I ask only for the strength to defend my people. (angrily drops the wood he has collected) If you would but lend me the ring...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. . . Frodo steps hurriedly away from Boromir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why do you recoil?   I am no thief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (wary) You are not yourself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What chance do you think you have? They will find you, they will take the ring and you will beg for death before the end. Frodo turns to leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You fool! It is not yours save by unhappy chance...it might have been mine. It should be mine. Give it to me! Give me the ring. Boromir leaps on top of Frodo, grasping for the ring! Frodo has only moments to act. Frodo rips the ring from around his neck..and rams it on his finger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boromir spins wildly around, yelling into thin air!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see your mind...you will take the ring to Sauron. You will betray us! You go to your death and the death of us all. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Curse you! Curse you and your Halflings! Boromir stumbles and falls. His body shakes as if in the Throes of a fit...slowly he comes to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Disoriented) Frodo! Frodo! What have I done. Please, Frodo... EXT. SEEING SEAT -- DAY IN THE TWILIGHT WORLD: FRODO races through the misty twilight world, past the foggy shapes of twisted trees. Somewhere behind him, Boromir's distraught voice carries from another dimension:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, Frodo...Frodo... Frodo suddenly finds himself on the stone steps...he clambers up the stairs, onto a high seat, perched on four stone pillars. Frodo cowers on the seat, like a lost child upon the throne of mountain kings. The world of mist swirls around him. Frodo peers out from the seat...the world seems to shrink. In all directions, Views of far off lands telescope towards him through the mist. IMAGES: ORCS spilling out of holes in the misty mountains... flames rising from Mirkwood...grim faced easterlings march to war...black ships sailing into the south. All the power of the Dark Lord is in motion. Frodo moves his gaze towards the east...fire explodes against the smoke, as a huge mass of black battlements fills Frodo's vision. A mountain of iron, immeasurably strong, tower of adamant: Barad-dur, FORTRESS OF SAURON! SUDDENLY!   SAURON'S EYE LEAPS TOWARD FRODO LIKE A FINGER OF LIGHT. SAURON (V.O.) (IN BLACK SPEECH) They will fall! Frodo leaps off the seat, and tumbles down the stairs! The eye sweeps Amon Hen like a searchlight, seeking its ring! With a huge effort, Frodo wrenches the ring off his finger... EXT. SUMMIT OF AMON HEN -- DAY Frodo lies gasping on the summit of Amon Hen...below the ancient ruins of the seeing seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . AT THAT MOMENT: A BLACK BOOT STEPS INTO SHOT! Frodo looks up as Aragorn towers over him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Frodo?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (numb) It has taken Boromir. ARAGORN moves towards Frodo...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (urgent) Where is the ring? Frodo backs away from Aragorn...Aragorn is shocked by the movement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay away!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Frodo...I swore to protect you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you protect me from yourself? Frodo uncurls his fist...in is palm lies the ring! It glints, gold and beautiful in the afternoon sun...Aragorn's eyes are drawn to it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would you destroy it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (kneeling to Frodo) I would have gone with you to the end... into the very fires of Mordor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know...Look after the others, especially Sam...he will not understand. Aragorn freezes!   He draws his sword.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (urgent) Go, Frodo! Frodo hesitates. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (yells) Run! Run!! Frodo backs away into the trees...as 200 URUK-HAI SWARM onto Amon Hen behind Aragorn! Aragorn attacks the leading URUK-HAI like a madman... he brings two down with his sword...leaping into the ruins as others close in on him. Frodo scrambles down the hillside, away from the fight. Aragorn battles the URUK-HAI, amongst the pillars and blocks of Amon Hen. Despite his bravery, he is quickly surrounded... SUDDENLY: ELVEN ARROWS smash into the URUK-HAI. Legolas races out of the woods, firing his bow. Gimli leaps into the battle, wielding his might axe. EXT. PARTH GALEN HILLSIDE -- DAY Frodo is darting down the steep hillside as heave feet thunder down behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Frodo! Sam looks around for Frodo. CLOSE ON: LURTZ ordering his URUKS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Find the Halflings ... find the halflings! Frodo stumbles and falls...quickly he crawls behind a tree...above him the sound of Uruk-Hai crashing through the forest rings out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (urgent whisper) Frodo! Frodo turns to see Merry and Pippin hidden in a hollow, a few feet away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hide here, quick!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on... Frodo looks at his friends... slowly shakes his head, a great sadness in his eyes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's he doing? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: Merry's eyes meet Frodo's.        Understanding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (softly) He's leaving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Pippin stands and makes a move toward Frodo...Merry grabs at his arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pippin! THE ECHO OF BOROMIR'S HORN reaches Aragorn, Legolas, and Gimli...they are battling their way down the Slopes towards the lake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The horn of Gondor!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boromir! Aragorn desperately slashes his way towards Boromir, felling URUK-HAI in his path...while Legolas and Gimli fight a rear guard action. MANY URUK-HAI fall to Boromir's sword as he tries to protect Merry and Pippin...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Run!   Run! Lurtz takes aim. A black arrow suddenly thuds into Boromir's chest. Amazingly, Boromir continues fighting, but another arrow...and another, brings him to his knees. Merry and Pippin are scooped off their feet by URUK-HAI.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aaaaagh!      Boromir! Boromir! Lurtz aims his bow at Boromir's heart... suddenly Aragorn charges at him, smashing the Bow with his sword. They lock into a deadly battle. Aragorn cuts Lurtz down and races towards Boromir, who lies slumped against a tree...URUK-HAI arrows sticking out of his chest. At least 20 dead URUK-HAI lie heaped around Boromir. His horn lies at his feet...Cloven in two.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (painful gasp) They took the little ones... (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aragorn quickly tries to staunch the flow of Blood from Boromir's shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (panicked) Frodo...where is Frodo?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I let Frodo go. Boromir holds Aragorn's gaze.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then you did what I could not.   I tried to take the ring from him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ring is beyond our reach now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forgive me, I did not see..I have failed you all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, Boromir. You fought bravely. You have kept your honor. Aragorn tries to bind Boromir's wound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leave it! It is over...the world of Men will fall and all will come to darkness and my city to ruin..Aragorn..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do not know what strength is in my blood, but I swear to you... I will not let the White City fall, nor your people fail...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Our people...our people... Aragorn places Boromir's sword in his hand.   Boromir's fingers tighten around the hilt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I would have followed you, my brother...my captain, my King. Aragorn lays Boromir down. He is dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be at peace, son of Gondor. Aragorn bends and Kisses Boromir's forehead. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Legolas and Gimli appear behind him...Aragorn stands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They will look for his coming from the white tower...but he will not return. EXT. SHORE OF NEN HITHOEL -- DAY On the lakeshore Frodo stands in front of one of the Elvish Boats, the ring in his palm. A distraught Sam...running as hard as he can through the forest...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Frodo! Close on: Frodo looks to the far side of the river...the camera moves in on the ring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wish the ring had never come to me..I wish none of this had happened... Tears fall down Frodo's face...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So do all who lie to see such times...but that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us. With renewed determination, Frodo tucks the ring inside his vest pocket. The small figure of Frodo pushing the Elvish boat into the water... Sam bursts through the trees and runs toward the lake...Frodo is already paddling away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (anguished) Not alone, Frodo. Mr. Frodo! Frodo, in the boat, paddling steadfastly away from the shore..tears in his eyes..the voice of Sam carried on the wind. Frodo whispers to himself
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, Sam. Sam looks at the water...then at the boat. SPLASH!   FRODO turns to see Sam launching himself into the water. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go back,Sam. I'm going to Mordor alone. Sam splashes hopelessly toward the boat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course you are...and I'm coming with you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't swim. Sam starts to go under, spluttering and coughing...Frodo drops his paddle and scrambles backwards in the boat...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (frightened) Sam! Sam is underwater...hands flailing helplessly as he sinks. Close on: Frodo's hand grasping Sam's... Frodo pulls a bedraggled and half drowned Sam into the boat. Frodo and Sam look at each other, out of breath, tears and water streaming down both their faces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I made a promise, Mr. Frodo...a promise. (fierce passion) "Don't you leave him, Samwise Gamgee." (sobs) And I don't mean to...I don't mean to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (crying) Oh, Sam! Frodo starts to laugh through his tears...the two friends hug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on then.. The two Hobbits row through the water... EXT. FALLS OF RAUROS AERIAL -- DAY Slow motion: Looking down on swiftly flowing water...Boromir's body slides under camera. He is lying in one of the boats, his arms across his chest..his broken horn at his side. Suddenly... the boat drops away from camera...as it plunges over the massive falls of Rauros, disappearing into the vapor below. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If we are quick, we will catch Frodo and Sam before nightfall. Aragorn looks towards the far shore; Frodo and Sam's small Boat can be seen lying on the distant Riverbank as Frodo and Sam make off into the forest beyond. He doesn't react. Legolas turns and looks at Aragorn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean not to follow them...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Frodo's fate is no longer in our hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then it has all been in vain...the fellowship has failed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not if we hold true to each other. We will not abandon Merry and Pippin to torment and death, not while we have strength left. Aragorn pulls a HUNTING KNIFE out of his pack and straps it on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leave all that can be spared behind...
direction.name: direction

result.heading: PILLARS OF THE KINGS, RIVER ANDUIN--DAWN
SEEING SEAT -- DAY IN THE TWILIGHT WORLD
SAURON'S EYE LEAPS TOWARD FRODO LIKE A FINGER OF LIGHT

direction.raw_text: ON: ARAGORN..a steely light in his eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (grimly) We travel light. Let's hunt some Orc.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes!   Ha! Aragorn, Legolas, and Gimli disappear into the Woods, following the URUK-HAI trail. EXT. EMYN MUIL HILLTOP -- DAY Frodo and Sam scramble onto a high ridge. A distant line of Saw toothed mountains below a dark, oppressive sky. Black volcanic smoke rises behind the mountains....MORDOR! (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction
